module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AgentFilter

-- | Contains information about an Amazon Inspector agent. This data type
--   is used as a request parameter in the ListAssessmentRunAgents action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAgentFilter</a> smart constructor.
data AgentFilter
AgentFilter' :: [AgentHealth] -> [AgentHealthCode] -> AgentFilter

-- | The current health state of the agent. Values can be set to
--   <b>HEALTHY</b> or <b>UNHEALTHY</b>.
[$sel:agentHealths:AgentFilter'] :: AgentFilter -> [AgentHealth]

-- | The detailed health state of the agent. Values can be set to
--   <b>IDLE</b>, <b>RUNNING</b>, <b>SHUTDOWN</b>, <b>UNHEALTHY</b>,
--   <b>THROTTLED</b>, and <b>UNKNOWN</b>.
[$sel:agentHealthCodes:AgentFilter'] :: AgentFilter -> [AgentHealthCode]

-- | Create a value of <a>AgentFilter</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   <b>HEALTHY</b> or <b>UNHEALTHY</b>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentHealthCodes:AgentFilter'</a>,
--   <a>agentFilter_agentHealthCodes</a> - The detailed health state of the
--   agent. Values can be set to <b>IDLE</b>, <b>RUNNING</b>,
--   <b>SHUTDOWN</b>, <b>UNHEALTHY</b>, <b>THROTTLED</b>, and
--   <b>UNKNOWN</b>.
newAgentFilter :: AgentFilter

-- | The current health state of the agent. Values can be set to
--   <b>HEALTHY</b> or <b>UNHEALTHY</b>.
agentFilter_agentHealths :: Lens' AgentFilter [AgentHealth]

-- | The detailed health state of the agent. Values can be set to
--   <b>IDLE</b>, <b>RUNNING</b>, <b>SHUTDOWN</b>, <b>UNHEALTHY</b>,

instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetType.AssetType
instance Network.AWS.Data.Headers.ToHeader Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetType.AssetType
instance Network.AWS.Data.Log.ToLog Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetType.AssetType
instance Network.AWS.Data.ByteString.ToByteString Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetType.AssetType
instance Network.AWS.Data.Text.ToText Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetType.AssetType
instance Network.AWS.Data.Text.FromText Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetType.AssetType
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetType.AssetType
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetType.AssetType
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetType.AssetType
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetType.AssetType
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetType.AssetType
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetType.AssetType
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetType.AssetType


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Attribute

-- | This data type is used as a request parameter in the
--   AddAttributesToFindings and CreateAssessmentTemplate actions.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAttribute</a> smart constructor.
data Attribute
Attribute' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> Attribute

-- | The value assigned to the attribute key.
[$sel:value:Attribute'] :: Attribute -> Maybe Text

-- | The attribute key.
[$sel:key:Attribute'] :: Attribute -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Attribute</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:Attribute'</a>, <a>attribute_value</a> - The value
--   assigned to the attribute key.
--   
--   <a>$sel:key:Attribute'</a>, <a>attribute_key</a> - The attribute key.
newAttribute :: Text -> Attribute

-- | The value assigned to the attribute key.
attribute_value :: Lens' Attribute (Maybe Text)

-- | The attribute key.
attribute_key :: Lens' Attribute Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Attribute.Attribute
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Attribute.Attribute
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Attribute.Attribute
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Attribute.Attribute
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Attribute.Attribute
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Attribute.Attribute
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Attribute.Attribute
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Attribute.Attribute


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentTemplate

-- | Contains information about an Amazon Inspector assessment template.
--   This data type is used as the response element in the
--   DescribeAssessmentTemplates action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentTemplate</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentTemplate
AssessmentTemplate' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Natural -> [Text] -> [Attribute] -> Int -> POSIX -> AssessmentTemplate

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the most recent assessment run
--   associated with this assessment template. This value exists only when
--   the value of assessmentRunCount is greaterpa than zero.
[$sel:lastAssessmentRunArn:AssessmentTemplate'] :: AssessmentTemplate -> Maybe Text

-- | The ARN of the assessment template.
[$sel:arn:AssessmentTemplate'] :: AssessmentTemplate -> Text

-- | The name of the assessment template.
[$sel:name:AssessmentTemplate'] :: AssessmentTemplate -> Text

-- | The ARN of the assessment target that corresponds to this assessment
--   template.
[$sel:assessmentTargetArn:AssessmentTemplate'] :: AssessmentTemplate -> Text

-- | The duration in seconds specified for this assessment template. The
--   default value is 3600 seconds (one hour). The maximum value is 86400
--   seconds (one day).
[$sel:durationInSeconds:AssessmentTemplate'] :: AssessmentTemplate -> Natural

-- | The rules packages that are specified for this assessment template.
[$sel:rulesPackageArns:AssessmentTemplate'] :: AssessmentTemplate -> [Text]

-- | The user-defined attributes that are assigned to every generated
--   finding from the assessment run that uses this assessment template.
[$sel:userAttributesForFindings:AssessmentTemplate'] :: AssessmentTemplate -> [Attribute]

-- | The number of existing assessment runs associated with this assessment
--   template. This value can be zero or a positive integer.
[$sel:assessmentRunCount:AssessmentTemplate'] :: AssessmentTemplate -> Int

-- | The time at which the assessment template is created.
[$sel:createdAt:AssessmentTemplate'] :: AssessmentTemplate -> POSIX

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentTemplate</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastAssessmentRunArn:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_lastAssessmentRunArn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) of the most recent assessment run associated with this
--   assessment template. This value exists only when the value of
--   assessmentRunCount is greaterpa than zero.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:AssessmentTemplate'</a>, <a>assessmentTemplate_arn</a> -
--   The ARN of the assessment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssessmentTemplate'</a>, <a>assessmentTemplate_name</a> -
--   The name of the assessment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentTargetArn:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_assessmentTargetArn</a> - The ARN of the
--   assessment target that corresponds to this assessment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:durationInSeconds:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_durationInSeconds</a> - The duration in seconds
--   specified for this assessment template. The default value is 3600
--   seconds (one hour). The maximum value is 86400 seconds (one day).
--   
--   <a>$sel:rulesPackageArns:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_rulesPackageArns</a> - The rules packages that
--   are specified for this assessment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:userAttributesForFindings:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_userAttributesForFindings</a> - The user-defined
--   attributes that are assigned to every generated finding from the
--   assessment run that uses this assessment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentRunCount:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_assessmentRunCount</a> - The number of existing
--   assessment runs associated with this assessment template. This value
--   can be zero or a positive integer.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdAt:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_createdAt</a> - The time at which the assessment
--   template is created.
newAssessmentTemplate :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Natural -> Int -> UTCTime -> AssessmentTemplate

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the most recent assessment run
--   associated with this assessment template. This value exists only when
--   the value of assessmentRunCount is greaterpa than zero.
assessmentTemplate_lastAssessmentRunArn :: Lens' AssessmentTemplate (Maybe Text)

-- | The ARN of the assessment template.
assessmentTemplate_arn :: Lens' AssessmentTemplate Text

-- | The name of the assessment template.
assessmentTemplate_name :: Lens' AssessmentTemplate Text

-- | The ARN of the assessment target that corresponds to this assessment
--   template.
assessmentTemplate_assessmentTargetArn :: Lens' AssessmentTemplate Text

-- | The duration in seconds specified for this assessment template. The
--   default value is 3600 seconds (one hour). The maximum value is 86400
--   seconds (one day).
assessmentTemplate_durationInSeconds :: Lens' AssessmentTemplate Natural

-- | The rules packages that are specified for this assessment template.
assessmentTemplate_rulesPackageArns :: Lens' AssessmentTemplate [Text]

-- | The user-defined attributes that are assigned to every generated
--   finding from the assessment run that uses this assessment template.
assessmentTemplate_userAttributesForFindings :: Lens' AssessmentTemplate [Attribute]

-- | The number of existing assessment runs associated with this assessment
--   template. This value can be zero or a positive integer.
assessmentTemplate_assessmentRunCount :: Lens' AssessmentTemplate Int

-- | The time at which the assessment template is created.
assessmentTemplate_createdAt :: Lens' AssessmentTemplate UTCTime
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentTemplate.AssessmentTemplate
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentTemplate.AssessmentTemplate
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentTemplate.AssessmentTemplate
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentTemplate.AssessmentTemplate
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentTemplate.AssessmentTemplate
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentTemplate.AssessmentTemplate
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentTemplate.AssessmentTemplate


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.DurationRange

-- | This data type is used in the AssessmentTemplateFilter data type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDurationRange</a> smart constructor.
data DurationRange
DurationRange' :: Maybe Natural -> Maybe Natural -> DurationRange

-- | The minimum value of the duration range. Must be greater than zero.
[$sel:minSeconds:DurationRange'] :: DurationRange -> Maybe Natural

-- | The maximum value of the duration range. Must be less than or equal to
--   604800 seconds (1 week).
[$sel:maxSeconds:DurationRange'] :: DurationRange -> Maybe Natural

-- | Create a value of <a>DurationRange</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:minSeconds:DurationRange'</a>, <a>durationRange_minSeconds</a>
--   - The minimum value of the duration range. Must be greater than zero.
--   
--   <a>$sel:maxSeconds:DurationRange'</a>, <a>durationRange_maxSeconds</a>
--   - The maximum value of the duration range. Must be less than or equal
--   to 604800 seconds (1 week).
newDurationRange :: DurationRange

-- | The minimum value of the duration range. Must be greater than zero.
durationRange_minSeconds :: Lens' DurationRange (Maybe Natural)

-- | The maximum value of the duration range. Must be less than or equal to
--   604800 seconds (1 week).
durationRange_maxSeconds :: Lens' DurationRange (Maybe Natural)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.DurationRange.DurationRange
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.DurationRange.DurationRange
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.DurationRange.DurationRange
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.DurationRange.DurationRange
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.DurationRange.DurationRange
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.DurationRange.DurationRange
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.DurationRange.DurationRange


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentTemplateFilter

-- | Used as the request parameter in the ListAssessmentTemplates action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentTemplateFilter</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentTemplateFilter
AssessmentTemplateFilter' :: Maybe DurationRange -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> AssessmentTemplateFilter

-- | For a record to match a filter, the value specified for this data type
--   property must inclusively match any value between the specified
--   minimum and maximum values of the <b>durationInSeconds</b> property of
--   the AssessmentTemplate data type.
[$sel:durationRange:AssessmentTemplateFilter'] :: AssessmentTemplateFilter -> Maybe DurationRange

-- | For a record to match a filter, the values that are specified for this
--   data type property must be contained in the list of values of the
--   <b>rulesPackageArns</b> property of the AssessmentTemplate data type.
[$sel:rulesPackageArns:AssessmentTemplateFilter'] :: AssessmentTemplateFilter -> Maybe [Text]

-- | For a record to match a filter, an explicit value or a string that
--   contains a wildcard that is specified for this data type property must
--   match the value of the <b>assessmentTemplateName</b> property of the
--   AssessmentTemplate data type.
[$sel:namePattern:AssessmentTemplateFilter'] :: AssessmentTemplateFilter -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentTemplateFilter</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:durationRange:AssessmentTemplateFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplateFilter_durationRange</a> - For a record to match
--   a filter, the value specified for this data type property must
--   inclusively match any value between the specified minimum and maximum
--   values of the <b>durationInSeconds</b> property of the
--   AssessmentTemplate data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:rulesPackageArns:AssessmentTemplateFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplateFilter_rulesPackageArns</a> - For a record to
--   match a filter, the values that are specified for this data type
--   property must be contained in the list of values of the
--   <b>rulesPackageArns</b> property of the AssessmentTemplate data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:namePattern:AssessmentTemplateFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplateFilter_namePattern</a> - For a record to match a
--   filter, an explicit value or a string that contains a wildcard that is
--   specified for this data type property must match the value of the
--   <b>assessmentTemplateName</b> property of the AssessmentTemplate data
--   type.
newAssessmentTemplateFilter :: AssessmentTemplateFilter

-- | For a record to match a filter, the value specified for this data type
--   property must inclusively match any value between the specified
--   minimum and maximum values of the <b>durationInSeconds</b> property of
--   the AssessmentTemplate data type.
assessmentTemplateFilter_durationRange :: Lens' AssessmentTemplateFilter (Maybe DurationRange)

-- | For a record to match a filter, the values that are specified for this
--   data type property must be contained in the list of values of the
--   <b>rulesPackageArns</b> property of the AssessmentTemplate data type.
assessmentTemplateFilter_rulesPackageArns :: Lens' AssessmentTemplateFilter (Maybe [Text])

-- | For a record to match a filter, an explicit value or a string that
--   contains a wildcard that is specified for this data type property must
--   match the value of the <b>assessmentTemplateName</b> property of the
--   AssessmentTemplate data type.
assessmentTemplateFilter_namePattern :: Lens' AssessmentTemplateFilter (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentTemplateFilter.AssessmentTemplateFilter
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentTemplateFilter.AssessmentTemplateFilter
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentTemplateFilter.AssessmentTemplateFilter
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentTemplateFilter.AssessmentTemplateFilter
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentTemplateFilter.AssessmentTemplateFilter
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentTemplateFilter.AssessmentTemplateFilter
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentTemplateFilter.AssessmentTemplateFilter

module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.FailedItemDetails

-- | Includes details about the failed items.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newFailedItemDetails</a> smart constructor.
data FailedItemDetails
FailedItemDetails' :: FailedItemErrorCode -> Bool -> FailedItemDetails

-- | The status code of a failed item.
[$sel:failureCode:FailedItemDetails'] :: FailedItemDetails -> FailedItemErrorCode

-- | Indicates whether you can immediately retry a request for this item
--   for a specified resource.
[$sel:retryable:FailedItemDetails'] :: FailedItemDetails -> Bool

-- | Create a value of <a>FailedItemDetails</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:failureCode:FailedItemDetails'</a>,
--   <a>failedItemDetails_failureCode</a> - The status code of a failed
--   item.
--   
--   <a>$sel:retryable:FailedItemDetails'</a>,
--   <a>failedItemDetails_retryable</a> - Indicates whether you can
--   immediately retry a request for this item for a specified resource.
newFailedItemDetails :: FailedItemErrorCode -> Bool -> FailedItemDetails

-- | The status code of a failed item.
failedItemDetails_failureCode :: Lens' FailedItemDetails FailedItemErrorCode

-- | Indicates whether you can immediately retry a request for this item
--   for a specified resource.
failedItemDetails_retryable :: Lens' FailedItemDetails Bool
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.FailedItemDetails.FailedItemDetails
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.FailedItemDetails.FailedItemDetails

module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.EventSubscription

-- | This data type is used in the Subscription data type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newEventSubscription</a> smart constructor.
data EventSubscription
EventSubscription' :: InspectorEvent -> POSIX -> EventSubscription

--   notifications are sent.
[$sel:event:EventSubscription'] :: EventSubscription -> InspectorEvent

-- | The time at which SubscribeToEvent is called.
[$sel:subscribedAt:EventSubscription'] :: EventSubscription -> POSIX

--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.

--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:event:EventSubscription'</a>, <a>eventSubscription_event</a> -
--   The event for which Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS)
--   notifications are sent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:subscribedAt:EventSubscription'</a>,
--   <a>eventSubscription_subscribedAt</a> - The time at which
--   SubscribeToEvent is called.
newEventSubscription :: InspectorEvent -> UTCTime -> EventSubscription

-- | The event for which Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS)
--   notifications are sent.
eventSubscription_event :: Lens' EventSubscription InspectorEvent

-- | The time at which SubscribeToEvent is called.
eventSubscription_subscribedAt :: Lens' EventSubscription UTCTime

module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRunNotification

-- | Used as one of the elements of the AssessmentRun data type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentRunNotification</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentRunNotification
AssessmentRunNotification' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode -> Maybe Text -> POSIX -> InspectorEvent -> Bool -> AssessmentRunNotification

-- | The message included in the notification.
[$sel:message:AssessmentRunNotification'] :: AssessmentRunNotification -> Maybe Text

-- | The status code of the SNS notification.
[$sel:snsPublishStatusCode:AssessmentRunNotification'] :: AssessmentRunNotification -> Maybe AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode

-- | The SNS topic to which the SNS notification is sent.
[$sel:snsTopicArn:AssessmentRunNotification'] :: AssessmentRunNotification -> Maybe Text

-- | The date of the notification.
[$sel:date:AssessmentRunNotification'] :: AssessmentRunNotification -> POSIX

-- | The event for which a notification is sent.
[$sel:event:AssessmentRunNotification'] :: AssessmentRunNotification -> InspectorEvent

-- | The Boolean value that specifies whether the notification represents
--   an error.
[$sel:error:AssessmentRunNotification'] :: AssessmentRunNotification -> Bool

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentRunNotification</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:message:AssessmentRunNotification'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunNotification_message</a> - The message included in the
--   notification.
--   
--   <a>$sel:snsPublishStatusCode:AssessmentRunNotification'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunNotification_snsPublishStatusCode</a> - The status
--   code of the SNS notification.
--   
--   <a>$sel:snsTopicArn:AssessmentRunNotification'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunNotification_snsTopicArn</a> - The SNS topic to which
--   the SNS notification is sent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:date:AssessmentRunNotification'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunNotification_date</a> - The date of the notification.
--   
--   <a>$sel:event:AssessmentRunNotification'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunNotification_event</a> - The event for which a
--   notification is sent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:error:AssessmentRunNotification'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunNotification_error</a> - The Boolean value that
--   specifies whether the notification represents an error.
newAssessmentRunNotification :: UTCTime -> InspectorEvent -> Bool -> AssessmentRunNotification

-- | The message included in the notification.
assessmentRunNotification_message :: Lens' AssessmentRunNotification (Maybe Text)

-- | The status code of the SNS notification.
assessmentRunNotification_snsPublishStatusCode :: Lens' AssessmentRunNotification (Maybe AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode)

-- | The SNS topic to which the SNS notification is sent.
assessmentRunNotification_snsTopicArn :: Lens' AssessmentRunNotification (Maybe Text)

-- | The date of the notification.
assessmentRunNotification_date :: Lens' AssessmentRunNotification UTCTime

-- | The event for which a notification is sent.
assessmentRunNotification_event :: Lens' AssessmentRunNotification InspectorEvent

-- | The Boolean value that specifies whether the notification represents
--   an error.
assessmentRunNotification_error :: Lens' AssessmentRunNotification Bool
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRunNotification.AssessmentRunNotification
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRunNotification.AssessmentRunNotification
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRunNotification.AssessmentRunNotification
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRunNotification.AssessmentRunNotification
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRunNotification.AssessmentRunNotification
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRunNotification.AssessmentRunNotification
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRunNotification.AssessmentRunNotification


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.InspectorServiceAttributes

-- | This data type is used in the Finding data type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newInspectorServiceAttributes</a> smart constructor.
data InspectorServiceAttributes
InspectorServiceAttributes' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Natural -> InspectorServiceAttributes

-- | The ARN of the rules package that is used to generate the finding.
[$sel:rulesPackageArn:InspectorServiceAttributes'] :: InspectorServiceAttributes -> Maybe Text

-- | The ARN of the assessment run during which the finding is generated.
[$sel:assessmentRunArn:InspectorServiceAttributes'] :: InspectorServiceAttributes -> Maybe Text

-- | The schema version of this data type.
[$sel:schemaVersion:InspectorServiceAttributes'] :: InspectorServiceAttributes -> Natural

-- | Create a value of <a>InspectorServiceAttributes</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:rulesPackageArn:InspectorServiceAttributes'</a>,
--   <a>inspectorServiceAttributes_rulesPackageArn</a> - The ARN of the
--   rules package that is used to generate the finding.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentRunArn:InspectorServiceAttributes'</a>,
--   <a>inspectorServiceAttributes_assessmentRunArn</a> - The ARN of the
--   assessment run during which the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:schemaVersion:InspectorServiceAttributes'</a>,
--   <a>inspectorServiceAttributes_schemaVersion</a> - The schema version
--   of this data type.
newInspectorServiceAttributes :: Natural -> InspectorServiceAttributes

-- | The ARN of the rules package that is used to generate the finding.
inspectorServiceAttributes_rulesPackageArn :: Lens' InspectorServiceAttributes (Maybe Text)

-- | The ARN of the assessment run during which the finding is generated.
inspectorServiceAttributes_assessmentRunArn :: Lens' InspectorServiceAttributes (Maybe Text)

-- | The schema version of this data type.
inspectorServiceAttributes_schemaVersion :: Lens' InspectorServiceAttributes Natural
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.InspectorServiceAttributes.InspectorServiceAttributes
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.InspectorServiceAttributes.InspectorServiceAttributes
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.InspectorServiceAttributes.InspectorServiceAttributes
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.InspectorServiceAttributes.InspectorServiceAttributes
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.InspectorServiceAttributes.InspectorServiceAttributes
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.InspectorServiceAttributes.InspectorServiceAttributes
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.InspectorServiceAttributes.InspectorServiceAttributes

module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.PrivateIp

-- | Contains information about a private IP address associated with a
--   network interface. This data type is used as a response element in the
--   DescribeFindings action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newPrivateIp</a> smart constructor.
data PrivateIp
PrivateIp' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> PrivateIp

-- | The DNS name of the private IP address.
[$sel:privateDnsName:PrivateIp'] :: PrivateIp -> Maybe Text

-- | The full IP address of the network inteface.
[$sel:privateIpAddress:PrivateIp'] :: PrivateIp -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>PrivateIp</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:privateDnsName:PrivateIp'</a>, <a>privateIp_privateDnsName</a>
--   - The DNS name of the private IP address.
--   
--   <a>$sel:privateIpAddress:PrivateIp'</a>,
--   <a>privateIp_privateIpAddress</a> - The full IP address of the network
--   inteface.
newPrivateIp :: PrivateIp

-- | The DNS name of the private IP address.
privateIp_privateDnsName :: Lens' PrivateIp (Maybe Text)

-- | The full IP address of the network inteface.
privateIp_privateIpAddress :: Lens' PrivateIp (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.PrivateIp.PrivateIp
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.PrivateIp.PrivateIp
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.PrivateIp.PrivateIp
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.PrivateIp.PrivateIp
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.PrivateIp.PrivateIp
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.PrivateIp.PrivateIp
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.PrivateIp.PrivateIp

module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ResourceGroupTag

-- | This data type is used as one of the elements of the ResourceGroup
--   data type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newResourceGroupTag</a> smart constructor.
data ResourceGroupTag
ResourceGroupTag' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> ResourceGroupTag

-- | The value assigned to a tag key.
[$sel:value:ResourceGroupTag'] :: ResourceGroupTag -> Maybe Text

-- | A tag key.
[$sel:key:ResourceGroupTag'] :: ResourceGroupTag -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ResourceGroupTag</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:ResourceGroupTag'</a>, <a>resourceGroupTag_value</a> -
--   The value assigned to a tag key.
--   
--   <a>$sel:key:ResourceGroupTag'</a>, <a>resourceGroupTag_key</a> - A tag
--   key.
newResourceGroupTag :: Text -> ResourceGroupTag

-- | The value assigned to a tag key.
resourceGroupTag_value :: Lens' ResourceGroupTag (Maybe Text)

-- | A tag key.
resourceGroupTag_key :: Lens' ResourceGroupTag Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ResourceGroupTag.ResourceGroupTag
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ResourceGroupTag.ResourceGroupTag
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ResourceGroupTag.ResourceGroupTag
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ResourceGroupTag.ResourceGroupTag
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ResourceGroupTag.ResourceGroupTag
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ResourceGroupTag.ResourceGroupTag
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ResourceGroupTag.ResourceGroupTag
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ResourceGroupTag.ResourceGroupTag


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ResourceGroup

-- | Contains information about a resource group. The resource group
--   defines a set of tags that, when queried, identify the AWS resources
--   that make up the assessment target. This data type is used as the
--   response element in the DescribeResourceGroups action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newResourceGroup</a> smart constructor.
data ResourceGroup
ResourceGroup' :: Text -> NonEmpty ResourceGroupTag -> POSIX -> ResourceGroup

-- | The ARN of the resource group.
[$sel:arn:ResourceGroup'] :: ResourceGroup -> Text

-- | The tags (key and value pairs) of the resource group. This data type
--   property is used in the CreateResourceGroup action.
[$sel:tags:ResourceGroup'] :: ResourceGroup -> NonEmpty ResourceGroupTag

-- | The time at which resource group is created.
[$sel:createdAt:ResourceGroup'] :: ResourceGroup -> POSIX

-- | Create a value of <a>ResourceGroup</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:ResourceGroup'</a>, <a>resourceGroup_arn</a> - The ARN of
--   the resource group.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:ResourceGroup'</a>, <a>resourceGroup_tags</a> - The tags
--   (key and value pairs) of the resource group. This data type property
--   is used in the CreateResourceGroup action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdAt:ResourceGroup'</a>, <a>resourceGroup_createdAt</a> -
--   The time at which resource group is created.
newResourceGroup :: Text -> NonEmpty ResourceGroupTag -> UTCTime -> ResourceGroup

-- | The ARN of the resource group.
resourceGroup_arn :: Lens' ResourceGroup Text

-- | The tags (key and value pairs) of the resource group. This data type
--   property is used in the CreateResourceGroup action.
resourceGroup_tags :: Lens' ResourceGroup (NonEmpty ResourceGroupTag)

-- | The time at which resource group is created.
resourceGroup_createdAt :: Lens' ResourceGroup UTCTime
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ResourceGroup.ResourceGroup
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ResourceGroup.ResourceGroup
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ResourceGroup.ResourceGroup
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ResourceGroup.ResourceGroup
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ResourceGroup.ResourceGroup
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ResourceGroup.ResourceGroup
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ResourceGroup.ResourceGroup


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.RulesPackage

-- | Contains information about an Amazon Inspector rules package. This
--   data type is used as the response element in the DescribeRulesPackages
--   action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newRulesPackage</a> smart constructor.
data RulesPackage
RulesPackage' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> RulesPackage

-- | The description of the rules package.
[$sel:description:RulesPackage'] :: RulesPackage -> Maybe Text

-- | The ARN of the rules package.
[$sel:arn:RulesPackage'] :: RulesPackage -> Text

-- | The name of the rules package.
[$sel:name:RulesPackage'] :: RulesPackage -> Text

-- | The version ID of the rules package.
[$sel:version:RulesPackage'] :: RulesPackage -> Text

-- | The provider of the rules package.
[$sel:provider:RulesPackage'] :: RulesPackage -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>RulesPackage</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:RulesPackage'</a>, <a>rulesPackage_description</a>
--   - The description of the rules package.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:RulesPackage'</a>, <a>rulesPackage_arn</a> - The ARN of
--   the rules package.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:RulesPackage'</a>, <a>rulesPackage_name</a> - The name of
--   the rules package.
--   
--   <a>$sel:version:RulesPackage'</a>, <a>rulesPackage_version</a> - The
--   version ID of the rules package.
--   
--   <a>$sel:provider:RulesPackage'</a>, <a>rulesPackage_provider</a> - The
--   provider of the rules package.
newRulesPackage :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> RulesPackage

-- | The description of the rules package.
rulesPackage_description :: Lens' RulesPackage (Maybe Text)

-- | The ARN of the rules package.
rulesPackage_arn :: Lens' RulesPackage Text

-- | The name of the rules package.
rulesPackage_name :: Lens' RulesPackage Text

-- | The version ID of the rules package.
rulesPackage_version :: Lens' RulesPackage Text

-- | The provider of the rules package.
rulesPackage_provider :: Lens' RulesPackage Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.RulesPackage.RulesPackage
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.RulesPackage.RulesPackage
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.RulesPackage.RulesPackage
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.RulesPackage.RulesPackage
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.RulesPackage.RulesPackage
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.RulesPackage.RulesPackage
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.RulesPackage.RulesPackage
