instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ScopeType.ScopeType
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ScopeType.ScopeType
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ScopeType.ScopeType


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Scope

-- | This data type contains key-value pairs that identify various Amazon
--   resources.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newScope</a> smart constructor.
data Scope
Scope' :: Maybe ScopeType -> Maybe Text -> Scope

-- | The type of the scope.
[$sel:key:Scope'] :: Scope -> Maybe ScopeType

-- | The resource identifier for the specified scope type.
[$sel:value:Scope'] :: Scope -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Scope</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:key:Scope'</a>, <a>scope_key</a> - The type of the scope.
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:Scope'</a>, <a>scope_value</a> - The resource identifier
--   for the specified scope type.
newScope :: Scope

-- | The type of the scope.
scope_key :: Lens' Scope (Maybe ScopeType)

-- | The resource identifier for the specified scope type.
scope_value :: Lens' Scope (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Scope.Scope
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Scope.Scope
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Scope.Scope
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Scope.Scope
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Scope.Scope
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Scope.Scope
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Scope.Scope


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ExclusionPreview

-- | Contains information about what is excluded from an assessment run
--   given the current state of the assessment template.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExclusionPreview</a> smart constructor.
data ExclusionPreview
ExclusionPreview' :: Maybe [Attribute] -> Text -> Text -> Text -> NonEmpty Scope -> ExclusionPreview

-- | The system-defined attributes for the exclusion preview.
[$sel:attributes:ExclusionPreview'] :: ExclusionPreview -> Maybe [Attribute]

-- | The name of the exclusion preview.
[$sel:title:ExclusionPreview'] :: ExclusionPreview -> Text

-- | The description of the exclusion preview.
[$sel:description:ExclusionPreview'] :: ExclusionPreview -> Text

-- | The recommendation for the exclusion preview.
[$sel:recommendation:ExclusionPreview'] :: ExclusionPreview -> Text

-- | The AWS resources for which the exclusion preview pertains.
[$sel:scopes:ExclusionPreview'] :: ExclusionPreview -> NonEmpty Scope

-- | Create a value of <a>ExclusionPreview</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:attributes:ExclusionPreview'</a>,
--   <a>exclusionPreview_attributes</a> - The system-defined attributes for
--   the exclusion preview.
--   
--   <a>$sel:title:ExclusionPreview'</a>, <a>exclusionPreview_title</a> -
--   The name of the exclusion preview.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:ExclusionPreview'</a>,
--   <a>exclusionPreview_description</a> - The description of the exclusion
--   preview.
--   
--   <a>$sel:recommendation:ExclusionPreview'</a>,
--   <a>exclusionPreview_recommendation</a> - The recommendation for the
--   exclusion preview.
--   
--   <a>$sel:scopes:ExclusionPreview'</a>, <a>exclusionPreview_scopes</a> -
--   The AWS resources for which the exclusion preview pertains.
newExclusionPreview :: Text -> Text -> Text -> NonEmpty Scope -> ExclusionPreview

-- | The system-defined attributes for the exclusion preview.
exclusionPreview_attributes :: Lens' ExclusionPreview (Maybe [Attribute])

-- | The name of the exclusion preview.
exclusionPreview_title :: Lens' ExclusionPreview Text

-- | The description of the exclusion preview.
exclusionPreview_description :: Lens' ExclusionPreview Text

-- | The recommendation for the exclusion preview.
exclusionPreview_recommendation :: Lens' ExclusionPreview Text

-- | The AWS resources for which the exclusion preview pertains.
exclusionPreview_scopes :: Lens' ExclusionPreview (NonEmpty Scope)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ExclusionPreview.ExclusionPreview
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ExclusionPreview.ExclusionPreview
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ExclusionPreview.ExclusionPreview
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ExclusionPreview.ExclusionPreview
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ExclusionPreview.ExclusionPreview
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ExclusionPreview.ExclusionPreview
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.ExclusionPreview.ExclusionPreview


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Exclusion

-- | Contains information about what was excluded from an assessment run.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExclusion</a> smart constructor.
data Exclusion
Exclusion' :: Maybe [Attribute] -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> NonEmpty Scope -> Exclusion

-- | The system-defined attributes for the exclusion.
[$sel:attributes:Exclusion'] :: Exclusion -> Maybe [Attribute]

-- | The ARN that specifies the exclusion.
[$sel:arn:Exclusion'] :: Exclusion -> Text

-- | The name of the exclusion.
[$sel:title:Exclusion'] :: Exclusion -> Text

-- | The description of the exclusion.
[$sel:description:Exclusion'] :: Exclusion -> Text

-- | The recommendation for the exclusion.
[$sel:recommendation:Exclusion'] :: Exclusion -> Text

-- | The AWS resources for which the exclusion pertains.
[$sel:scopes:Exclusion'] :: Exclusion -> NonEmpty Scope

-- | Create a value of <a>Exclusion</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:attributes:Exclusion'</a>, <a>exclusion_attributes</a> - The
--   system-defined attributes for the exclusion.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:Exclusion'</a>, <a>exclusion_arn</a> - The ARN that
--   specifies the exclusion.
--   
--   <a>$sel:title:Exclusion'</a>, <a>exclusion_title</a> - The name of the
--   exclusion.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:Exclusion'</a>, <a>exclusion_description</a> - The
--   description of the exclusion.
--   
--   <a>$sel:recommendation:Exclusion'</a>, <a>exclusion_recommendation</a>
--   - The recommendation for the exclusion.
--   
--   <a>$sel:scopes:Exclusion'</a>, <a>exclusion_scopes</a> - The AWS
--   resources for which the exclusion pertains.
newExclusion :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> NonEmpty Scope -> Exclusion

-- | The system-defined attributes for the exclusion.
exclusion_attributes :: Lens' Exclusion (Maybe [Attribute])

-- | The ARN that specifies the exclusion.
exclusion_arn :: Lens' Exclusion Text

-- | The name of the exclusion.
exclusion_title :: Lens' Exclusion Text

-- | The description of the exclusion.
exclusion_description :: Lens' Exclusion Text

-- | The recommendation for the exclusion.
exclusion_recommendation :: Lens' Exclusion Text

-- | The AWS resources for which the exclusion pertains.
exclusion_scopes :: Lens' Exclusion (NonEmpty Scope)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Exclusion.Exclusion
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Exclusion.Exclusion
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Exclusion.Exclusion
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Exclusion.Exclusion
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Exclusion.Exclusion
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Exclusion.Exclusion
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Exclusion.Exclusion


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.SecurityGroup

-- | Contains information about a security group associated with a network
--   interface. This data type is used as one of the elements of the
--   NetworkInterface data type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSecurityGroup</a> smart constructor.
data SecurityGroup
SecurityGroup' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> SecurityGroup

-- | The name of the security group.
[$sel:groupName:SecurityGroup'] :: SecurityGroup -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of the security group.
[$sel:groupId:SecurityGroup'] :: SecurityGroup -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>SecurityGroup</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:groupName:SecurityGroup'</a>, <a>securityGroup_groupName</a> -
--   The name of the security group.
--   
--   <a>$sel:groupId:SecurityGroup'</a>, <a>securityGroup_groupId</a> - The
--   ID of the security group.
newSecurityGroup :: SecurityGroup

-- | The name of the security group.
securityGroup_groupName :: Lens' SecurityGroup (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the security group.
securityGroup_groupId :: Lens' SecurityGroup (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.SecurityGroup.SecurityGroup
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.SecurityGroup.SecurityGroup
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.SecurityGroup.SecurityGroup
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.SecurityGroup.SecurityGroup
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.SecurityGroup.SecurityGroup
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.SecurityGroup.SecurityGroup
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.SecurityGroup.SecurityGroup


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.NetworkInterface

-- | Contains information about the network interfaces interacting with an
--   EC2 instance. This data type is used as one of the elements of the
--   AssetAttributes data type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newNetworkInterface</a> smart constructor.
data NetworkInterface
NetworkInterface' :: Maybe [PrivateIp] -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe [SecurityGroup] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> NetworkInterface

-- | A list of the private IP addresses associated with the network
--   interface. Includes the privateDnsName and privateIpAddress.
[$sel:privateIpAddresses:NetworkInterface'] :: NetworkInterface -> Maybe [PrivateIp]

-- | The IP addresses associated with the network interface.
[$sel:ipv6Addresses:NetworkInterface'] :: NetworkInterface -> Maybe [Text]

-- | A list of the security groups associated with the network interface.
--   Includes the groupId and groupName.
[$sel:securityGroups:NetworkInterface'] :: NetworkInterface -> Maybe [SecurityGroup]

-- | The name of a public DNS associated with the network interface.
[$sel:publicDnsName:NetworkInterface'] :: NetworkInterface -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of a subnet associated with the network interface.
[$sel:subnetId:NetworkInterface'] :: NetworkInterface -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of the network interface.
[$sel:networkInterfaceId:NetworkInterface'] :: NetworkInterface -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of a private DNS associated with the network interface.
[$sel:privateDnsName:NetworkInterface'] :: NetworkInterface -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of a VPC associated with the network interface.
[$sel:vpcId:NetworkInterface'] :: NetworkInterface -> Maybe Text

-- | The public IP address from which the network interface is reachable.
[$sel:publicIp:NetworkInterface'] :: NetworkInterface -> Maybe Text

-- | The private IP address associated with the network interface.
[$sel:privateIpAddress:NetworkInterface'] :: NetworkInterface -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>NetworkInterface</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:privateIpAddresses:NetworkInterface'</a>,
--   <a>networkInterface_privateIpAddresses</a> - A list of the private IP
--   addresses associated with the network interface. Includes the
--   privateDnsName and privateIpAddress.
--   
--   <a>$sel:ipv6Addresses:NetworkInterface'</a>,
--   <a>networkInterface_ipv6Addresses</a> - The IP addresses associated
--   with the network interface.
--   
--   <a>$sel:securityGroups:NetworkInterface'</a>,
--   <a>networkInterface_securityGroups</a> - A list of the security groups
--   associated with the network interface. Includes the groupId and
--   groupName.
--   
--   <a>$sel:publicDnsName:NetworkInterface'</a>,
--   <a>networkInterface_publicDnsName</a> - The name of a public DNS
--   associated with the network interface.
--   
--   <a>$sel:subnetId:NetworkInterface'</a>,
--   <a>networkInterface_subnetId</a> - The ID of a subnet associated with
--   the network interface.
--   
--   <a>$sel:networkInterfaceId:NetworkInterface'</a>,
--   <a>networkInterface_networkInterfaceId</a> - The ID of the network
--   interface.
--   
--   <a>$sel:privateDnsName:NetworkInterface'</a>,
--   <a>networkInterface_privateDnsName</a> - The name of a private DNS
--   associated with the network interface.
--   
--   <a>$sel:vpcId:NetworkInterface'</a>, <a>networkInterface_vpcId</a> -
--   The ID of a VPC associated with the network interface.
--   
--   <a>$sel:publicIp:NetworkInterface'</a>,
--   <a>networkInterface_publicIp</a> - The public IP address from which
--   the network interface is reachable.
--   
--   <a>$sel:privateIpAddress:NetworkInterface'</a>,
--   <a>networkInterface_privateIpAddress</a> - The private IP address
--   associated with the network interface.
newNetworkInterface :: NetworkInterface

-- | A list of the private IP addresses associated with the network
--   interface. Includes the privateDnsName and privateIpAddress.
networkInterface_privateIpAddresses :: Lens' NetworkInterface (Maybe [PrivateIp])

-- | The IP addresses associated with the network interface.
networkInterface_ipv6Addresses :: Lens' NetworkInterface (Maybe [Text])

-- | A list of the security groups associated with the network interface.
--   Includes the groupId and groupName.
networkInterface_securityGroups :: Lens' NetworkInterface (Maybe [SecurityGroup])

-- | The name of a public DNS associated with the network interface.
networkInterface_publicDnsName :: Lens' NetworkInterface (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of a subnet associated with the network interface.
networkInterface_subnetId :: Lens' NetworkInterface (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the network interface.
networkInterface_networkInterfaceId :: Lens' NetworkInterface (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of a private DNS associated with the network interface.
networkInterface_privateDnsName :: Lens' NetworkInterface (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of a VPC associated with the network interface.
networkInterface_vpcId :: Lens' NetworkInterface (Maybe Text)

-- | The public IP address from which the network interface is reachable.
networkInterface_publicIp :: Lens' NetworkInterface (Maybe Text)

-- | The private IP address associated with the network interface.
networkInterface_privateIpAddress :: Lens' NetworkInterface (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.NetworkInterface.NetworkInterface
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.NetworkInterface.NetworkInterface
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.NetworkInterface.NetworkInterface
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.NetworkInterface.NetworkInterface
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.NetworkInterface.NetworkInterface
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.NetworkInterface.NetworkInterface
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.NetworkInterface.NetworkInterface


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Severity
newtype Severity
Severity' :: Text -> Severity
[fromSeverity] :: Severity -> Text
pattern Severity_High :: Severity
pattern Severity_Informational :: Severity
pattern Severity_Low :: Severity
pattern Severity_Medium :: Severity
pattern Severity_Undefined :: Severity
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.ToXML Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Severity.Severity
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Severity.Severity
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSONKey Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Severity.Severity
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Severity.Severity
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSONKey Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Severity.Severity
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Severity.Severity
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Severity.Severity
instance Network.AWS.Data.Headers.ToHeader Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Severity.Severity
instance Network.AWS.Data.Log.ToLog Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Severity.Severity
instance Network.AWS.Data.ByteString.ToByteString Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Severity.Severity
instance Network.AWS.Data.Text.ToText Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Severity.Severity
instance Network.AWS.Data.Text.FromText Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Severity.Severity
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Severity.Severity
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Severity.Severity
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Severity.Severity
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Severity.Severity
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Severity.Severity
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Severity.Severity
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Severity.Severity


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRun

-- | A snapshot of an Amazon Inspector assessment run that contains the
--   findings of the assessment run .
--   
--   Used as the response element in the DescribeAssessmentRuns action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentRun</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentRun
AssessmentRun' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe POSIX -> Text -> Text -> Text -> AssessmentRunState -> Natural -> NonEmpty Text -> [Attribute] -> POSIX -> POSIX -> Bool -> [AssessmentRunStateChange] -> [AssessmentRunNotification] -> HashMap Severity Int -> AssessmentRun

-- | The time when StartAssessmentRun was called.
[$sel:startedAt:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The assessment run completion time that corresponds to the rules
--   packages evaluation completion time or failure.
[$sel:completedAt:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The ARN of the assessment run.
[$sel:arn:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> Text

-- | The auto-generated name for the assessment run.
[$sel:name:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> Text

-- | The ARN of the assessment template that is associated with the
--   assessment run.
[$sel:assessmentTemplateArn:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> Text

-- | The state of the assessment run.
[$sel:state:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> AssessmentRunState

-- | The duration of the assessment run.
[$sel:durationInSeconds:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> Natural

-- | The rules packages selected for the assessment run.
[$sel:rulesPackageArns:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> NonEmpty Text

-- | The user-defined attributes that are assigned to every generated
--   finding.
[$sel:userAttributesForFindings:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> [Attribute]

-- | The time when StartAssessmentRun was called.
[$sel:createdAt:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> POSIX

-- | The last time when the assessment run's state changed.
[$sel:stateChangedAt:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> POSIX

-- | A Boolean value (true or false) that specifies whether the process of
--   collecting data from the agents is completed.
[$sel:dataCollected:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> Bool

-- | A list of the assessment run state changes.
[$sel:stateChanges:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> [AssessmentRunStateChange]

-- | A list of notifications for the event subscriptions. A notification
--   about a particular generated finding is added to this list only once.
[$sel:notifications:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> [AssessmentRunNotification]

-- | Provides a total count of generated findings per severity.
[$sel:findingCounts:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> HashMap Severity Int

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentRun</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:startedAt:AssessmentRun'</a>, <a>assessmentRun_startedAt</a> -
--   The time when StartAssessmentRun was called.
--   
--   <a>$sel:completedAt:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_completedAt</a> - The assessment run completion time
--   that corresponds to the rules packages evaluation completion time or
--   failure.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:AssessmentRun'</a>, <a>assessmentRun_arn</a> - The ARN of
--   the assessment run.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssessmentRun'</a>, <a>assessmentRun_name</a> - The
--   auto-generated name for the assessment run.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentTemplateArn:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_assessmentTemplateArn</a> - The ARN of the assessment
--   template that is associated with the assessment run.
--   
--   <a>$sel:state:AssessmentRun'</a>, <a>assessmentRun_state</a> - The
--   state of the assessment run.
--   
--   <a>$sel:durationInSeconds:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_durationInSeconds</a> - The duration of the
--   assessment run.
--   
--   <a>$sel:rulesPackageArns:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_rulesPackageArns</a> - The rules packages selected
--   for the assessment run.
--   
--   <a>$sel:userAttributesForFindings:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_userAttributesForFindings</a> - The user-defined
--   attributes that are assigned to every generated finding.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdAt:AssessmentRun'</a>, <a>assessmentRun_createdAt</a> -
--   The time when StartAssessmentRun was called.
--   
--   <a>$sel:stateChangedAt:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_stateChangedAt</a> - The last time when the
--   assessment run's state changed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:dataCollected:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_dataCollected</a> - A Boolean value (true or false)
--   that specifies whether the process of collecting data from the agents
--   is completed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:stateChanges:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_stateChanges</a> - A list of the assessment run state
--   changes.
--   
--   <a>$sel:notifications:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_notifications</a> - A list of notifications for the
--   event subscriptions. A notification about a particular generated
--   finding is added to this list only once.
--   
--   <a>$sel:findingCounts:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_findingCounts</a> - Provides a total count of
--   generated findings per severity.
newAssessmentRun :: Text -> Text -> Text -> AssessmentRunState -> Natural -> NonEmpty Text -> UTCTime -> UTCTime -> Bool -> AssessmentRun

-- | The time when StartAssessmentRun was called.
assessmentRun_startedAt :: Lens' AssessmentRun (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The assessment run completion time that corresponds to the rules
--   packages evaluation completion time or failure.
assessmentRun_completedAt :: Lens' AssessmentRun (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The ARN of the assessment run.
assessmentRun_arn :: Lens' AssessmentRun Text

-- | The auto-generated name for the assessment run.
assessmentRun_name :: Lens' AssessmentRun Text

-- | The ARN of the assessment template that is associated with the
--   assessment run.
assessmentRun_assessmentTemplateArn :: Lens' AssessmentRun Text

-- | The state of the assessment run.
assessmentRun_state :: Lens' AssessmentRun AssessmentRunState

-- | The duration of the assessment run.
assessmentRun_durationInSeconds :: Lens' AssessmentRun Natural

-- | The rules packages selected for the assessment run.
assessmentRun_rulesPackageArns :: Lens' AssessmentRun (NonEmpty Text)

-- | The user-defined attributes that are assigned to every generated
--   finding.
assessmentRun_userAttributesForFindings :: Lens' AssessmentRun [Attribute]

-- | The time when StartAssessmentRun was called.
assessmentRun_createdAt :: Lens' AssessmentRun UTCTime

-- | The last time when the assessment run's state changed.
assessmentRun_stateChangedAt :: Lens' AssessmentRun UTCTime

-- | A Boolean value (true or false) that specifies whether the process of
--   collecting data from the agents is completed.
assessmentRun_dataCollected :: Lens' AssessmentRun Bool

-- | A list of the assessment run state changes.
assessmentRun_stateChanges :: Lens' AssessmentRun [AssessmentRunStateChange]

-- | A list of notifications for the event subscriptions. A notification
--   about a particular generated finding is added to this list only once.
assessmentRun_notifications :: Lens' AssessmentRun [AssessmentRunNotification]

-- | Provides a total count of generated findings per severity.
assessmentRun_findingCounts :: Lens' AssessmentRun (HashMap Severity Int)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRun.AssessmentRun
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRun.AssessmentRun
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRun.AssessmentRun
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRun.AssessmentRun
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRun.AssessmentRun
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRun.AssessmentRun
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRun.AssessmentRun


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.StopAction
newtype StopAction
StopAction' :: Text -> StopAction
[fromStopAction] :: StopAction -> Text
pattern StopAction_SKIP_EVALUATION :: StopAction
pattern StopAction_START_EVALUATION :: StopAction
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.ToXML Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.StopAction.StopAction
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.StopAction.StopAction
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSONKey Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.StopAction.StopAction
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.StopAction.StopAction
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSONKey Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.StopAction.StopAction
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.StopAction.StopAction
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.StopAction.StopAction
instance Network.AWS.Data.Headers.ToHeader Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.StopAction.StopAction
instance Network.AWS.Data.Log.ToLog Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.StopAction.StopAction
instance Network.AWS.Data.ByteString.ToByteString Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.StopAction.StopAction
instance Network.AWS.Data.Text.ToText Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.StopAction.StopAction
instance Network.AWS.Data.Text.FromText Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.StopAction.StopAction
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.StopAction.StopAction
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.StopAction.StopAction
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.StopAction.StopAction
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.StopAction.StopAction
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.StopAction.StopAction
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.StopAction.StopAction
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.StopAction.StopAction


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Subscription

-- | This data type is used as a response element in the
--   ListEventSubscriptions action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSubscription</a> smart constructor.
data Subscription
Subscription' :: Text -> Text -> NonEmpty EventSubscription -> Subscription

-- | The ARN of the assessment template that is used during the event for
--   which the SNS notification is sent.
[$sel:resourceArn:Subscription'] :: Subscription -> Text

-- | The ARN of the Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS) topic to which
--   the SNS notifications are sent.
[$sel:topicArn:Subscription'] :: Subscription -> Text

-- | The list of existing event subscriptions.
[$sel:eventSubscriptions:Subscription'] :: Subscription -> NonEmpty EventSubscription

-- | Create a value of <a>Subscription</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceArn:Subscription'</a>, <a>subscription_resourceArn</a>
--   - The ARN of the assessment template that is used during the event for
--   which the SNS notification is sent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:topicArn:Subscription'</a>, <a>subscription_topicArn</a> - The
--   ARN of the Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS) topic to which the
--   SNS notifications are sent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:eventSubscriptions:Subscription'</a>,
--   <a>subscription_eventSubscriptions</a> - The list of existing event
--   subscriptions.
newSubscription :: Text -> Text -> NonEmpty EventSubscription -> Subscription

-- | The ARN of the assessment template that is used during the event for
--   which the SNS notification is sent.
subscription_resourceArn :: Lens' Subscription Text

-- | The ARN of the Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS) topic to which
--   the SNS notifications are sent.
subscription_topicArn :: Lens' Subscription Text

-- | The list of existing event subscriptions.
subscription_eventSubscriptions :: Lens' Subscription (NonEmpty EventSubscription)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Subscription.Subscription
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Subscription.Subscription
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Subscription.Subscription
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Subscription.Subscription
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Subscription.Subscription
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Subscription.Subscription
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Subscription.Subscription


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Tag

-- | A key and value pair. This data type is used as a request parameter in
--   the SetTagsForResource action and a response element in the
--   ListTagsForResource action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newTag</a> smart constructor.
data Tag
Tag' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> Tag

-- | A value assigned to a tag key.
[$sel:value:Tag'] :: Tag -> Maybe Text

-- | A tag key.
[$sel:key:Tag'] :: Tag -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Tag</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:Tag'</a>, <a>tag_value</a> - A value assigned to a tag
--   key.
--   
--   <a>$sel:key:Tag'</a>, <a>tag_key</a> - A tag key.
newTag :: Text -> Tag

-- | A value assigned to a tag key.
tag_value :: Lens' Tag (Maybe Text)

-- | A tag key.
tag_key :: Lens' Tag Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Tag.Tag
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Tag.Tag
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Tag.Tag
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Tag.Tag
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Tag.Tag
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Tag.Tag
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Tag.Tag
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Tag.Tag


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetAttributes

-- | A collection of attributes of the host from which the finding is
--   generated.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssetAttributes</a> smart constructor.
data AssetAttributes
AssetAttributes' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe [Tag] -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe [NetworkInterface] -> Maybe Text -> Natural -> AssetAttributes

-- | The hostname of the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
[$sel:hostname:AssetAttributes'] :: AssetAttributes -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of the agent that is installed on the EC2 instance where the
--   finding is generated.
[$sel:agentId:AssetAttributes'] :: AssetAttributes -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of the Amazon Machine Image (AMI) that is installed on the EC2
--   instance where the finding is generated.
[$sel:amiId:AssetAttributes'] :: AssetAttributes -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags related to the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
[$sel:tags:AssetAttributes'] :: AssetAttributes -> Maybe [Tag]

-- | The list of IP v4 addresses of the EC2 instance where the finding is
--   generated.
[$sel:ipv4Addresses:AssetAttributes'] :: AssetAttributes -> Maybe [Text]

-- | An array of the network interfaces interacting with the EC2 instance
--   where the finding is generated.
[$sel:networkInterfaces:AssetAttributes'] :: AssetAttributes -> Maybe [NetworkInterface]

-- | The Auto Scaling group of the EC2 instance where the finding is
--   generated.
[$sel:autoScalingGroup:AssetAttributes'] :: AssetAttributes -> Maybe Text

-- | The schema version of this data type.
[$sel:schemaVersion:AssetAttributes'] :: AssetAttributes -> Natural

-- | Create a value of <a>AssetAttributes</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:hostname:AssetAttributes'</a>, <a>assetAttributes_hostname</a>
--   - The hostname of the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentId:AssetAttributes'</a>, <a>assetAttributes_agentId</a> -
--   The ID of the agent that is installed on the EC2 instance where the
--   finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:amiId:AssetAttributes'</a>, <a>assetAttributes_amiId</a> - The
--   ID of the Amazon Machine Image (AMI) that is installed on the EC2
--   instance where the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:AssetAttributes'</a>, <a>assetAttributes_tags</a> - The
--   tags related to the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:ipv4Addresses:AssetAttributes'</a>,
--   <a>assetAttributes_ipv4Addresses</a> - The list of IP v4 addresses of
--   the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:networkInterfaces:AssetAttributes'</a>,
--   <a>assetAttributes_networkInterfaces</a> - An array of the network
--   interfaces interacting with the EC2 instance where the finding is
--   generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:autoScalingGroup:AssetAttributes'</a>,
--   <a>assetAttributes_autoScalingGroup</a> - The Auto Scaling group of
--   the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:schemaVersion:AssetAttributes'</a>,
--   <a>assetAttributes_schemaVersion</a> - The schema version of this data
--   type.
newAssetAttributes :: Natural -> AssetAttributes

-- | The hostname of the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
assetAttributes_hostname :: Lens' AssetAttributes (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the agent that is installed on the EC2 instance where the
--   finding is generated.
assetAttributes_agentId :: Lens' AssetAttributes (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the Amazon Machine Image (AMI) that is installed on the EC2
--   instance where the finding is generated.
assetAttributes_amiId :: Lens' AssetAttributes (Maybe Text)

-- | The tags related to the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
assetAttributes_tags :: Lens' AssetAttributes (Maybe [Tag])

-- | The list of IP v4 addresses of the EC2 instance where the finding is
--   generated.
assetAttributes_ipv4Addresses :: Lens' AssetAttributes (Maybe [Text])

-- | An array of the network interfaces interacting with the EC2 instance
--   where the finding is generated.
assetAttributes_networkInterfaces :: Lens' AssetAttributes (Maybe [NetworkInterface])

-- | The Auto Scaling group of the EC2 instance where the finding is
--   generated.
assetAttributes_autoScalingGroup :: Lens' AssetAttributes (Maybe Text)

-- | The schema version of this data type.
assetAttributes_schemaVersion :: Lens' AssetAttributes Natural
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetAttributes.AssetAttributes
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetAttributes.AssetAttributes
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetAttributes.AssetAttributes
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetAttributes.AssetAttributes
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetAttributes.AssetAttributes
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetAttributes.AssetAttributes
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssetAttributes.AssetAttributes


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Finding

-- | Contains information about an Amazon Inspector finding. This data type
--   is used as the response element in the DescribeFindings action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newFinding</a> smart constructor.
data Finding
Finding' :: Maybe AssetAttributes -> Maybe Severity -> Maybe AssetType -> Maybe Double -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe InspectorServiceAttributes -> Maybe Natural -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Natural -> Text -> [Attribute] -> [Attribute] -> POSIX -> POSIX -> Finding

-- | A collection of attributes of the host from which the finding is
--   generated.
[$sel:assetAttributes:Finding'] :: Finding -> Maybe AssetAttributes

-- | The finding severity. Values can be set to High, Medium, Low, and
--   Informational.
[$sel:severity:Finding'] :: Finding -> Maybe Severity

-- | The type of the host from which the finding is generated.
[$sel:assetType:Finding'] :: Finding -> Maybe AssetType

-- | The numeric value of the finding severity.
[$sel:numericSeverity:Finding'] :: Finding -> Maybe Double

-- | The name of the finding.
[$sel:title:Finding'] :: Finding -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of the finding.
[$sel:id:Finding'] :: Finding -> Maybe Text

-- | The data element is set to "Inspector".
[$sel:service:Finding'] :: Finding -> Maybe Text

-- | This data type is used in the Finding data type.
[$sel:serviceAttributes:Finding'] :: Finding -> Maybe InspectorServiceAttributes

-- | This data element is currently not used.
[$sel:confidence:Finding'] :: Finding -> Maybe Natural

-- | The recommendation for the finding.
[$sel:recommendation:Finding'] :: Finding -> Maybe Text

-- | This data element is currently not used.
[$sel:indicatorOfCompromise:Finding'] :: Finding -> Maybe Bool

-- | The description of the finding.
[$sel:description:Finding'] :: Finding -> Maybe Text

-- | The schema version of this data type.
[$sel:schemaVersion:Finding'] :: Finding -> Maybe Natural

-- | The ARN that specifies the finding.
[$sel:arn:Finding'] :: Finding -> Text

-- | The system-defined attributes for the finding.
[$sel:attributes:Finding'] :: Finding -> [Attribute]

-- | The user-defined attributes that are assigned to the finding.
[$sel:userAttributes:Finding'] :: Finding -> [Attribute]

-- | The time when the finding was generated.
[$sel:createdAt:Finding'] :: Finding -> POSIX

-- | The time when AddAttributesToFindings is called.
[$sel:updatedAt:Finding'] :: Finding -> POSIX

-- | Create a value of <a>Finding</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:assetAttributes:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_assetAttributes</a> -
--   A collection of attributes of the host from which the finding is
--   generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:severity:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_severity</a> - The finding
--   severity. Values can be set to High, Medium, Low, and Informational.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assetType:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_assetType</a> - The type of
--   the host from which the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:numericSeverity:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_numericSeverity</a> -
--   The numeric value of the finding severity.
--   
--   <a>$sel:title:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_title</a> - The name of the
--   finding.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_id</a> - The ID of the finding.
--   
--   <a>$sel:service:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_service</a> - The data
--   element is set to "Inspector".
--   
--   <a>$sel:serviceAttributes:Finding'</a>,
--   <a>finding_serviceAttributes</a> - This data type is used in the
--   Finding data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:confidence:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_confidence</a> - This data
--   element is currently not used.
--   
--   <a>$sel:recommendation:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_recommendation</a> -
--   The recommendation for the finding.
--   
--   <a>$sel:indicatorOfCompromise:Finding'</a>,
--   <a>finding_indicatorOfCompromise</a> - This data element is currently
--   not used.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_description</a> - The
--   description of the finding.
--   
--   <a>$sel:schemaVersion:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_schemaVersion</a> - The
--   schema version of this data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_arn</a> - The ARN that specifies
--   the finding.
--   
--   <a>$sel:attributes:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_attributes</a> - The
--   system-defined attributes for the finding.
--   
--   <a>$sel:userAttributes:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_userAttributes</a> -
--   The user-defined attributes that are assigned to the finding.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdAt:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_createdAt</a> - The time
--   when the finding was generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:updatedAt:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_updatedAt</a> - The time
--   when AddAttributesToFindings is called.
newFinding :: Text -> UTCTime -> UTCTime -> Finding

-- | A collection of attributes of the host from which the finding is
--   generated.
finding_assetAttributes :: Lens' Finding (Maybe AssetAttributes)

-- | The finding severity. Values can be set to High, Medium, Low, and
--   Informational.
finding_severity :: Lens' Finding (Maybe Severity)

-- | The type of the host from which the finding is generated.
finding_assetType :: Lens' Finding (Maybe AssetType)

-- | The numeric value of the finding severity.
finding_numericSeverity :: Lens' Finding (Maybe Double)

-- | The name of the finding.
finding_title :: Lens' Finding (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the finding.
finding_id :: Lens' Finding (Maybe Text)

-- | The data element is set to "Inspector".
finding_service :: Lens' Finding (Maybe Text)

-- | This data type is used in the Finding data type.
finding_serviceAttributes :: Lens' Finding (Maybe InspectorServiceAttributes)

-- | This data element is currently not used.
finding_confidence :: Lens' Finding (Maybe Natural)

-- | The recommendation for the finding.
finding_recommendation :: Lens' Finding (Maybe Text)

-- | This data element is currently not used.
finding_indicatorOfCompromise :: Lens' Finding (Maybe Bool)

-- | The description of the finding.
finding_description :: Lens' Finding (Maybe Text)

-- | The schema version of this data type.
finding_schemaVersion :: Lens' Finding (Maybe Natural)

-- | The ARN that specifies the finding.
finding_arn :: Lens' Finding Text

-- | The system-defined attributes for the finding.
finding_attributes :: Lens' Finding [Attribute]

-- | The user-defined attributes that are assigned to the finding.
finding_userAttributes :: Lens' Finding [Attribute]

-- | The time when the finding was generated.
finding_createdAt :: Lens' Finding UTCTime

-- | The time when AddAttributesToFindings is called.
finding_updatedAt :: Lens' Finding UTCTime
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Finding.Finding
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Finding.Finding
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Finding.Finding
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Finding.Finding
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Finding.Finding
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Finding.Finding
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.Finding.Finding


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.TelemetryMetadata

-- | The metadata about the Amazon Inspector application data metrics
--   collected by the agent. This data type is used as the response element
--   in the GetTelemetryMetadata action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newTelemetryMetadata</a> smart constructor.
data TelemetryMetadata
TelemetryMetadata' :: Maybe Integer -> Text -> Integer -> TelemetryMetadata

-- | The data size of messages that the agent sends to the Amazon Inspector
--   service.
[$sel:dataSize:TelemetryMetadata'] :: TelemetryMetadata -> Maybe Integer

-- | A specific type of behavioral data that is collected by the agent.
[$sel:messageType:TelemetryMetadata'] :: TelemetryMetadata -> Text

-- | The count of messages that the agent sends to the Amazon Inspector
--   service.
[$sel:count:TelemetryMetadata'] :: TelemetryMetadata -> Integer

-- | Create a value of <a>TelemetryMetadata</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:dataSize:TelemetryMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>telemetryMetadata_dataSize</a> - The data size of messages that the
--   agent sends to the Amazon Inspector service.
--   
--   <a>$sel:messageType:TelemetryMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>telemetryMetadata_messageType</a> - A specific type of behavioral
--   data that is collected by the agent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:count:TelemetryMetadata'</a>, <a>telemetryMetadata_count</a> -
--   The count of messages that the agent sends to the Amazon Inspector
--   service.
newTelemetryMetadata :: Text -> Integer -> TelemetryMetadata

-- | The data size of messages that the agent sends to the Amazon Inspector
--   service.
telemetryMetadata_dataSize :: Lens' TelemetryMetadata (Maybe Integer)

-- | A specific type of behavioral data that is collected by the agent.
telemetryMetadata_messageType :: Lens' TelemetryMetadata Text

-- | The count of messages that the agent sends to the Amazon Inspector
--   service.
telemetryMetadata_count :: Lens' TelemetryMetadata Integer
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.TelemetryMetadata.TelemetryMetadata
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.TelemetryMetadata.TelemetryMetadata
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.TelemetryMetadata.TelemetryMetadata
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.TelemetryMetadata.TelemetryMetadata
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.TelemetryMetadata.TelemetryMetadata
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.TelemetryMetadata.TelemetryMetadata
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.TelemetryMetadata.TelemetryMetadata


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRunAgent

-- | Contains information about an Amazon Inspector agent. This data type
--   is used as a response element in the ListAssessmentRunAgents action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentRunAgent</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentRunAgent
AssessmentRunAgent' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Text -> Text -> AgentHealth -> AgentHealthCode -> [TelemetryMetadata] -> AssessmentRunAgent

-- | The description for the agent health code.
[$sel:agentHealthDetails:AssessmentRunAgent'] :: AssessmentRunAgent -> Maybe Text

-- | The Auto Scaling group of the EC2 instance that is specified by the
--   agent ID.
[$sel:autoScalingGroup:AssessmentRunAgent'] :: AssessmentRunAgent -> Maybe Text

-- | The AWS account of the EC2 instance where the agent is installed.
[$sel:agentId:AssessmentRunAgent'] :: AssessmentRunAgent -> Text

-- | The ARN of the assessment run that is associated with the agent.
[$sel:assessmentRunArn:AssessmentRunAgent'] :: AssessmentRunAgent -> Text

-- | The current health state of the agent.
[$sel:agentHealth:AssessmentRunAgent'] :: AssessmentRunAgent -> AgentHealth

-- | The detailed health state of the agent.
[$sel:agentHealthCode:AssessmentRunAgent'] :: AssessmentRunAgent -> AgentHealthCode

-- | The Amazon Inspector application data metrics that are collected by
--   the agent.
[$sel:telemetryMetadata:AssessmentRunAgent'] :: AssessmentRunAgent -> [TelemetryMetadata]

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentRunAgent</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentHealthDetails:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_agentHealthDetails</a> - The description for the
--   agent health code.
--   
--   <a>$sel:autoScalingGroup:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_autoScalingGroup</a> - The Auto Scaling group of
--   the EC2 instance that is specified by the agent ID.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentId:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_agentId</a> - The AWS account of the EC2
--   instance where the agent is installed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentRunArn:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_assessmentRunArn</a> - The ARN of the assessment
--   run that is associated with the agent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentHealth:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_agentHealth</a> - The current health state of
--   the agent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentHealthCode:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_agentHealthCode</a> - The detailed health state
--   of the agent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:telemetryMetadata:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_telemetryMetadata</a> - The Amazon Inspector
--   application data metrics that are collected by the agent.
newAssessmentRunAgent :: Text -> Text -> AgentHealth -> AgentHealthCode -> AssessmentRunAgent

-- | The description for the agent health code.
assessmentRunAgent_agentHealthDetails :: Lens' AssessmentRunAgent (Maybe Text)

-- | The Auto Scaling group of the EC2 instance that is specified by the
--   agent ID.
assessmentRunAgent_autoScalingGroup :: Lens' AssessmentRunAgent (Maybe Text)

-- | The AWS account of the EC2 instance where the agent is installed.
assessmentRunAgent_agentId :: Lens' AssessmentRunAgent Text

-- | The ARN of the assessment run that is associated with the agent.
assessmentRunAgent_assessmentRunArn :: Lens' AssessmentRunAgent Text

-- | The current health state of the agent.
assessmentRunAgent_agentHealth :: Lens' AssessmentRunAgent AgentHealth

-- | The detailed health state of the agent.
assessmentRunAgent_agentHealthCode :: Lens' AssessmentRunAgent AgentHealthCode

-- | The Amazon Inspector application data metrics that are collected by
--   the agent.
assessmentRunAgent_telemetryMetadata :: Lens' AssessmentRunAgent [TelemetryMetadata]
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRunAgent.AssessmentRunAgent
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRunAgent.AssessmentRunAgent
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRunAgent.AssessmentRunAgent
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRunAgent.AssessmentRunAgent
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRunAgent.AssessmentRunAgent
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRunAgent.AssessmentRunAgent
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRunAgent.AssessmentRunAgent


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.TimestampRange

-- | This data type is used in the AssessmentRunFilter data type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newTimestampRange</a> smart constructor.
data TimestampRange
TimestampRange' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe POSIX -> TimestampRange

-- | The minimum value of the timestamp range.
[$sel:beginDate:TimestampRange'] :: TimestampRange -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The maximum value of the timestamp range.
[$sel:endDate:TimestampRange'] :: TimestampRange -> Maybe POSIX

-- | Create a value of <a>TimestampRange</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:beginDate:TimestampRange'</a>, <a>timestampRange_beginDate</a>
--   - The minimum value of the timestamp range.
--   
--   <a>$sel:endDate:TimestampRange'</a>, <a>timestampRange_endDate</a> -
--   The maximum value of the timestamp range.
newTimestampRange :: TimestampRange

-- | The minimum value of the timestamp range.
timestampRange_beginDate :: Lens' TimestampRange (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The maximum value of the timestamp range.
timestampRange_endDate :: Lens' TimestampRange (Maybe UTCTime)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.TimestampRange.TimestampRange
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.TimestampRange.TimestampRange
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.TimestampRange.TimestampRange
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.TimestampRange.TimestampRange
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.TimestampRange.TimestampRange
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.TimestampRange.TimestampRange
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.TimestampRange.TimestampRange


module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.FindingFilter

-- | This data type is used as a request parameter in the ListFindings
--   action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newFindingFilter</a> smart constructor.
data FindingFilter
FindingFilter' :: Maybe [Text] -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe TimestampRange -> Maybe [Severity] -> Maybe [Attribute] -> Maybe [Attribute] -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe [Text] -> FindingFilter

-- | For a record to match a filter, one of the values that is specified
--   for this data type property must be the exact match of the value of
--   the <b>agentId</b> property of the Finding data type.
[$sel:agentIds:FindingFilter'] :: FindingFilter -> Maybe [Text]

-- | For a record to match a filter, one of the values that is specified
--   for this data type property must be the exact match of the value of
--   the <b>rulesPackageArn</b> property of the Finding data type.
[$sel:rulesPackageArns:FindingFilter'] :: FindingFilter -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The time range during which the finding is generated.
[$sel:creationTimeRange:FindingFilter'] :: FindingFilter -> Maybe TimestampRange

-- | For a record to match a filter, one of the values that is specified
--   for this data type property must be the exact match of the value of
--   the <b>severity</b> property of the Finding data type.
[$sel:severities:FindingFilter'] :: FindingFilter -> Maybe [Severity]

-- | For a record to match a filter, the list of values that are specified
--   for this data type property must be contained in the list of values of
--   the <b>attributes</b> property of the Finding data type.
[$sel:attributes:FindingFilter'] :: FindingFilter -> Maybe [Attribute]

-- | For a record to match a filter, the value that is specified for this
--   data type property must be contained in the list of values of the
--   <b>userAttributes</b> property of the Finding data type.
[$sel:userAttributes:FindingFilter'] :: FindingFilter -> Maybe [Attribute]

-- | For a record to match a filter, one of the values that is specified
--   for this data type property must be the exact match of the value of
--   the <b>autoScalingGroup</b> property of the Finding data type.
[$sel:autoScalingGroups:FindingFilter'] :: FindingFilter -> Maybe [Text]

-- | For a record to match a filter, one of the values that is specified
--   for this data type property must be the exact match of the value of
--   the <b>ruleName</b> property of the Finding data type.
[$sel:ruleNames:FindingFilter'] :: FindingFilter -> Maybe [Text]

-- | Create a value of <a>FindingFilter</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentIds:FindingFilter'</a>, <a>findingFilter_agentIds</a> -
--   For a record to match a filter, one of the values that is specified
--   for this data type property must be the exact match of the value of
--   the <b>agentId</b> property of the Finding data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:rulesPackageArns:FindingFilter'</a>,
--   <a>findingFilter_rulesPackageArns</a> - For a record to match a
--   filter, one of the values that is specified for this data type
--   property must be the exact match of the value of the
--   <b>rulesPackageArn</b> property of the Finding data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTimeRange:FindingFilter'</a>,
--   <a>findingFilter_creationTimeRange</a> - The time range during which
--   the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:severities:FindingFilter'</a>, <a>findingFilter_severities</a>
--   - For a record to match a filter, one of the values that is specified
--   for this data type property must be the exact match of the value of
--   the <b>severity</b> property of the Finding data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:attributes:FindingFilter'</a>, <a>findingFilter_attributes</a>
--   - For a record to match a filter, the list of values that are
--   specified for this data type property must be contained in the list of
--   values of the <b>attributes</b> property of the Finding data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:userAttributes:FindingFilter'</a>,
--   <a>findingFilter_userAttributes</a> - For a record to match a filter,
--   the value that is specified for this data type property must be
--   contained in the list of values of the <b>userAttributes</b> property
--   of the Finding data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:autoScalingGroups:FindingFilter'</a>,
--   <a>findingFilter_autoScalingGroups</a> - For a record to match a
--   filter, one of the values that is specified for this data type
--   property must be the exact match of the value of the
--   <b>autoScalingGroup</b> property of the Finding data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:ruleNames:FindingFilter'</a>, <a>findingFilter_ruleNames</a> -
--   For a record to match a filter, one of the values that is specified
--   for this data type property must be the exact match of the value of
--   the <b>ruleName</b> property of the Finding data type.
newFindingFilter :: FindingFilter

-- | For a record to match a filter, one of the values that is specified
--   for this data type property must be the exact match of the value of
--   the <b>agentId</b> property of the Finding data type.
findingFilter_agentIds :: Lens' FindingFilter (Maybe [Text])

-- | For a record to match a filter, one of the values that is specified
--   for this data type property must be the exact match of the value of
--   the <b>rulesPackageArn</b> property of the Finding data type.
findingFilter_rulesPackageArns :: Lens' FindingFilter (Maybe [Text])

-- | The time range during which the finding is generated.
findingFilter_creationTimeRange :: Lens' FindingFilter (Maybe TimestampRange)

-- | For a record to match a filter, one of the values that is specified
--   for this data type property must be the exact match of the value of
--   the <b>severity</b> property of the Finding data type.
findingFilter_severities :: Lens' FindingFilter (Maybe [Severity])

-- | For a record to match a filter, the list of values that are specified
--   for this data type property must be contained in the list of values of
--   the <b>attributes</b> property of the Finding data type.
findingFilter_attributes :: Lens' FindingFilter (Maybe [Attribute])

-- | For a record to match a filter, the value that is specified for this
--   data type property must be contained in the list of values of the
--   <b>userAttributes</b> property of the Finding data type.
findingFilter_userAttributes :: Lens' FindingFilter (Maybe [Attribute])

-- | For a record to match a filter, one of the values that is specified
--   for this data type property must be the exact match of the value of
--   the <b>autoScalingGroup</b> property of the Finding data type.
findingFilter_autoScalingGroups :: Lens' FindingFilter (Maybe [Text])

-- | For a record to match a filter, one of the values that is specified
--   for this data type property must be the exact match of the value of
--   the <b>ruleName</b> property of the Finding data type.
findingFilter_ruleNames :: Lens' FindingFilter (Maybe [Text])

module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types.AssessmentRunFilter

-- | Used as the request parameter in the ListAssessmentRuns action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentRunFilter</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentRunFilter
AssessmentRunFilter' :: Maybe [AssessmentRunState] -> Maybe DurationRange -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe TimestampRange -> Maybe TimestampRange -> Maybe Text -> Maybe TimestampRange -> AssessmentRunFilter

-- | For a record to match a filter, one of the values specified for this
--   data type property must be the exact match of the value of the
--   <b>assessmentRunState</b> property of the AssessmentRun data type.
[$sel:states:AssessmentRunFilter'] :: AssessmentRunFilter -> Maybe [AssessmentRunState]

-- | For a record to match a filter, the value that is specified for this
--   data type property must inclusively match any value between the
--   specified minimum and maximum values of the <b>durationInSeconds</b>
--   property of the AssessmentRun data type.
[$sel:durationRange:AssessmentRunFilter'] :: AssessmentRunFilter -> Maybe DurationRange

-- | For a record to match a filter, the value that is specified for this
--   data type property must be contained in the list of values of the
--   <b>rulesPackages</b> property of the AssessmentRun data type.
[$sel:rulesPackageArns:AssessmentRunFilter'] :: AssessmentRunFilter -> Maybe [Text]

-- | For a record to match a filter, the value that is specified for this
--   data type property must match the <b>stateChangedAt</b> property of
--   the AssessmentRun data type.
[$sel:stateChangeTimeRange:AssessmentRunFilter'] :: AssessmentRunFilter -> Maybe TimestampRange

-- | For a record to match a filter, the value that is specified for this
--   data type property must inclusively match any value between the
--   specified minimum and maximum values of the <b>startTime</b> property
--   of the AssessmentRun data type.
[$sel:startTimeRange:AssessmentRunFilter'] :: AssessmentRunFilter -> Maybe TimestampRange

-- | For a record to match a filter, an explicit value or a string
--   containing a wildcard that is specified for this data type property
--   must match the value of the <b>assessmentRunName</b> property of the
--   AssessmentRun data type.
[$sel:namePattern:AssessmentRunFilter'] :: AssessmentRunFilter -> Maybe Text

-- | For a record to match a filter, the value that is specified for this
--   data type property must inclusively match any value between the
--   specified minimum and maximum values of the <b>completedAt</b>
--   property of the AssessmentRun data type.
[$sel:completionTimeRange:AssessmentRunFilter'] :: AssessmentRunFilter -> Maybe TimestampRange

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentRunFilter</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:states:AssessmentRunFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunFilter_states</a> - For a record to match a filter,
--   one of the values specified for this data type property must be the
--   exact match of the value of the <b>assessmentRunState</b> property of
--   the AssessmentRun data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:durationRange:AssessmentRunFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunFilter_durationRange</a> - For a record to match a
--   filter, the value that is specified for this data type property must
--   inclusively match any value between the specified minimum and maximum
--   values of the <b>durationInSeconds</b> property of the AssessmentRun
--   data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:rulesPackageArns:AssessmentRunFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunFilter_rulesPackageArns</a> - For a record to match a
--   filter, the value that is specified for this data type property must
--   be contained in the list of values of the <b>rulesPackages</b>
--   property of the AssessmentRun data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:stateChangeTimeRange:AssessmentRunFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunFilter_stateChangeTimeRange</a> - For a record to
--   match a filter, the value that is specified for this data type
--   property must match the <b>stateChangedAt</b> property of the
--   AssessmentRun data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:startTimeRange:AssessmentRunFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunFilter_startTimeRange</a> - For a record to match a
--   filter, the value that is specified for this data type property must
--   inclusively match any value between the specified minimum and maximum
--   values of the <b>startTime</b> property of the AssessmentRun data
--   type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:namePattern:AssessmentRunFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunFilter_namePattern</a> - For a record to match a
--   filter, an explicit value or a string containing a wildcard that is
--   specified for this data type property must match the value of the
--   <b>assessmentRunName</b> property of the AssessmentRun data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:completionTimeRange:AssessmentRunFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunFilter_completionTimeRange</a> - For a record to match
--   a filter, the value that is specified for this data type property must
--   inclusively match any value between the specified minimum and maximum
--   values of the <b>completedAt</b> property of the AssessmentRun data
--   type.
newAssessmentRunFilter :: AssessmentRunFilter

-- | For a record to match a filter, one of the values specified for this
--   data type property must be the exact match of the value of the
--   <b>assessmentRunState</b> property of the AssessmentRun data type.
assessmentRunFilter_states :: Lens' AssessmentRunFilter (Maybe [AssessmentRunState])

--   data type property must inclusively match any value between the
--   specified minimum and maximum values of the <b>durationInSeconds</b>

--   specified minimum and maximum values of the <b>startTime</b> property

assessmentRunFilter_startTimeRange :: Lens' AssessmentRunFilter (Maybe TimestampRange)

--   containing a wildcard that is specified for this data type property

assessmentRunFilter_completionTimeRange :: Lens' AssessmentRunFilter (Maybe TimestampRange)
