module Network.AWS.Inspector.Types

-- | API version <tt>2016-02-16</tt> of the Amazon Inspector SDK
--   configuration.
defaultService :: Service

-- | The request is rejected. The specified assessment template is
--   currently generating an exclusions preview.
_PreviewGenerationInProgressException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The serice is temporary unavailable.
_ServiceTemporarilyUnavailableException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | Used by the GetAssessmentReport API. The request was rejected because
--   you tried to generate a report for an assessment run that existed
--   before reporting was supported in Amazon Inspector. You can only
--   generate reports for assessment runs that took place or will take
--   place after generating reports in Amazon Inspector became available.
_UnsupportedFeatureException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The request was rejected because an invalid or out-of-range value was
--   supplied for an input parameter.
_InvalidInputException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | Internal server error.
_InternalException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | Amazon Inspector cannot assume the cross-account role that it needs to
--   list your EC2 instances during the assessment run.
_InvalidCrossAccountRoleException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | You started an assessment run, but one of the instances is already
--   participating in another assessment run.
_AgentsAlreadyRunningAssessmentException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | You cannot perform a specified action if an assessment run is
--   currently in progress.
_AssessmentRunInProgressException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | You do not have required permissions to access the requested resource.
_AccessDeniedException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The request was rejected because it attempted to create resources
--   beyond the current AWS account limits. The error code describes the
--   limit exceeded.
_LimitExceededException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The request was rejected because it referenced an entity that does not
--   exist. The error code describes the entity.
_NoSuchEntityException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError
newtype AgentHealth
AgentHealth' :: Text -> AgentHealth
[fromAgentHealth] :: AgentHealth -> Text
pattern AgentHealth_HEALTHY :: AgentHealth
pattern AgentHealth_UNHEALTHY :: AgentHealth
pattern AgentHealth_UNKNOWN :: AgentHealth
newtype AgentHealthCode
AgentHealthCode' :: Text -> AgentHealthCode
[fromAgentHealthCode] :: AgentHealthCode -> Text
pattern AgentHealthCode_IDLE :: AgentHealthCode
pattern AgentHealthCode_RUNNING :: AgentHealthCode
pattern AgentHealthCode_SHUTDOWN :: AgentHealthCode
pattern AgentHealthCode_THROTTLED :: AgentHealthCode
pattern AgentHealthCode_UNHEALTHY :: AgentHealthCode
pattern AgentHealthCode_UNKNOWN :: AgentHealthCode
newtype AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode
AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode' :: Text -> AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode
[fromAssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode] :: AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode -> Text
pattern AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode_ACCESS_DENIED :: AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode
pattern AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode_INTERNAL_ERROR :: AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode
pattern AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode_SUCCESS :: AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode
pattern AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode_TOPIC_DOES_NOT_EXIST :: AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode
newtype AssessmentRunState
AssessmentRunState' :: Text -> AssessmentRunState
[fromAssessmentRunState] :: AssessmentRunState -> Text
pattern AssessmentRunState_CANCELED :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_COLLECTING_DATA :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_COMPLETED :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_COMPLETED_WITH_ERRORS :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_CREATED :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_DATA_COLLECTED :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_ERROR :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_EVALUATING_RULES :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_FAILED :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_START_DATA_COLLECTION_IN_PROGRESS :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_START_DATA_COLLECTION_PENDING :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_START_EVALUATING_RULES_PENDING :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_STOP_DATA_COLLECTION_PENDING :: AssessmentRunState
newtype AssetType
AssetType' :: Text -> AssetType
[fromAssetType] :: AssetType -> Text
pattern AssetType_Ec2_instance :: AssetType
newtype FailedItemErrorCode
FailedItemErrorCode' :: Text -> FailedItemErrorCode
[fromFailedItemErrorCode] :: FailedItemErrorCode -> Text
pattern FailedItemErrorCode_ACCESS_DENIED :: FailedItemErrorCode
pattern FailedItemErrorCode_DUPLICATE_ARN :: FailedItemErrorCode
pattern FailedItemErrorCode_INTERNAL_ERROR :: FailedItemErrorCode
pattern FailedItemErrorCode_INVALID_ARN :: FailedItemErrorCode
pattern FailedItemErrorCode_ITEM_DOES_NOT_EXIST :: FailedItemErrorCode
pattern FailedItemErrorCode_LIMIT_EXCEEDED :: FailedItemErrorCode
newtype InspectorEvent
InspectorEvent' :: Text -> InspectorEvent
[fromInspectorEvent] :: InspectorEvent -> Text
pattern InspectorEvent_ASSESSMENT_RUN_COMPLETED :: InspectorEvent
pattern InspectorEvent_ASSESSMENT_RUN_STARTED :: InspectorEvent
pattern InspectorEvent_ASSESSMENT_RUN_STATE_CHANGED :: InspectorEvent
pattern InspectorEvent_FINDING_REPORTED :: InspectorEvent
pattern InspectorEvent_OTHER :: InspectorEvent
newtype Locale
Locale' :: Text -> Locale
[fromLocale] :: Locale -> Text
pattern Locale_EN_US :: Locale
newtype PreviewStatus
PreviewStatus' :: Text -> PreviewStatus
[fromPreviewStatus] :: PreviewStatus -> Text
pattern PreviewStatus_COMPLETED :: PreviewStatus
pattern PreviewStatus_WORK_IN_PROGRESS :: PreviewStatus
newtype ReportFileFormat
ReportFileFormat' :: Text -> ReportFileFormat
[fromReportFileFormat] :: ReportFileFormat -> Text
pattern ReportFileFormat_HTML :: ReportFileFormat
pattern ReportFileFormat_PDF :: ReportFileFormat
newtype ReportStatus
ReportStatus' :: Text -> ReportStatus
[fromReportStatus] :: ReportStatus -> Text
pattern ReportStatus_COMPLETED :: ReportStatus
pattern ReportStatus_FAILED :: ReportStatus
pattern ReportStatus_WORK_IN_PROGRESS :: ReportStatus
newtype ReportType
ReportType' :: Text -> ReportType
[fromReportType] :: ReportType -> Text
pattern ReportType_FINDING :: ReportType
pattern ReportType_FULL :: ReportType
newtype ScopeType
ScopeType' :: Text -> ScopeType
[fromScopeType] :: ScopeType -> Text
pattern ScopeType_INSTANCE_ID :: ScopeType
pattern ScopeType_RULES_PACKAGE_ARN :: ScopeType
newtype Severity
Severity' :: Text -> Severity
[fromSeverity] :: Severity -> Text
pattern Severity_High :: Severity
pattern Severity_Informational :: Severity
pattern Severity_Low :: Severity
pattern Severity_Medium :: Severity
pattern Severity_Undefined :: Severity
newtype StopAction
StopAction' :: Text -> StopAction
[fromStopAction] :: StopAction -> Text
pattern StopAction_SKIP_EVALUATION :: StopAction
pattern StopAction_START_EVALUATION :: StopAction

-- | Contains information about an Amazon Inspector agent. This data type
--   is used as a request parameter in the ListAssessmentRunAgents action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAgentFilter</a> smart constructor.
data AgentFilter
AgentFilter' :: [AgentHealth] -> [AgentHealthCode] -> AgentFilter

-- | The current health state of the agent. Values can be set to
--   <b>HEALTHY</b> or <b>UNHEALTHY</b>.
[$sel:agentHealths:AgentFilter'] :: AgentFilter -> [AgentHealth]

-- | The detailed health state of the agent. Values can be set to
--   <b>IDLE</b>, <b>RUNNING</b>, <b>SHUTDOWN</b>, <b>UNHEALTHY</b>,
--   <b>THROTTLED</b>, and <b>UNKNOWN</b>.
[$sel:agentHealthCodes:AgentFilter'] :: AgentFilter -> [AgentHealthCode]

-- | Create a value of <a>AgentFilter</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentHealths:AgentFilter'</a>, <a>agentFilter_agentHealths</a>
--   - The current health state of the agent. Values can be set to
--   <b>HEALTHY</b> or <b>UNHEALTHY</b>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentHealthCodes:AgentFilter'</a>,
--   <a>agentFilter_agentHealthCodes</a> - The detailed health state of the
--   agent. Values can be set to <b>IDLE</b>, <b>RUNNING</b>,
--   <b>SHUTDOWN</b>, <b>UNHEALTHY</b>, <b>THROTTLED</b>, and
--   <b>UNKNOWN</b>.
newAgentFilter :: AgentFilter

-- | The current health state of the agent. Values can be set to
--   <b>HEALTHY</b> or <b>UNHEALTHY</b>.
agentFilter_agentHealths :: Lens' AgentFilter [AgentHealth]

-- | The detailed health state of the agent. Values can be set to
--   <b>IDLE</b>, <b>RUNNING</b>, <b>SHUTDOWN</b>, <b>UNHEALTHY</b>,
--   <b>THROTTLED</b>, and <b>UNKNOWN</b>.
agentFilter_agentHealthCodes :: Lens' AgentFilter [AgentHealthCode]

-- | Used as a response element in the PreviewAgents action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAgentPreview</a> smart constructor.
data AgentPreview
AgentPreview' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe AgentHealth -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Text -> AgentPreview

-- | The hostname of the EC2 instance on which the Amazon Inspector Agent
--   is installed.
[$sel:hostname:AgentPreview'] :: AgentPreview -> Maybe Text

-- | The version of the Amazon Inspector Agent.
[$sel:agentVersion:AgentPreview'] :: AgentPreview -> Maybe Text

-- | The kernel version of the operating system running on the EC2 instance
--   on which the Amazon Inspector Agent is installed.
[$sel:kernelVersion:AgentPreview'] :: AgentPreview -> Maybe Text

-- | The operating system running on the EC2 instance on which the Amazon
--   Inspector Agent is installed.
[$sel:operatingSystem:AgentPreview'] :: AgentPreview -> Maybe Text

-- | The health status of the Amazon Inspector Agent.
[$sel:agentHealth:AgentPreview'] :: AgentPreview -> Maybe AgentHealth

-- | The Auto Scaling group for the EC2 instance where the agent is
--   installed.
[$sel:autoScalingGroup:AgentPreview'] :: AgentPreview -> Maybe Text

-- | The IP address of the EC2 instance on which the Amazon Inspector Agent
--   is installed.
[$sel:ipv4Address:AgentPreview'] :: AgentPreview -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of the EC2 instance where the agent is installed.
[$sel:agentId:AgentPreview'] :: AgentPreview -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AgentPreview</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:hostname:AgentPreview'</a>, <a>agentPreview_hostname</a> - The
--   hostname of the EC2 instance on which the Amazon Inspector Agent is
--   installed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentVersion:AgentPreview'</a>,
--   <a>agentPreview_agentVersion</a> - The version of the Amazon Inspector
--   Agent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:kernelVersion:AgentPreview'</a>,
--   <a>agentPreview_kernelVersion</a> - The kernel version of the
--   operating system running on the EC2 instance on which the Amazon
--   Inspector Agent is installed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:operatingSystem:AgentPreview'</a>,
--   <a>agentPreview_operatingSystem</a> - The operating system running on
--   the EC2 instance on which the Amazon Inspector Agent is installed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentHealth:AgentPreview'</a>, <a>agentPreview_agentHealth</a>
--   - The health status of the Amazon Inspector Agent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:autoScalingGroup:AgentPreview'</a>,
--   <a>agentPreview_autoScalingGroup</a> - The Auto Scaling group for the
--   EC2 instance where the agent is installed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:ipv4Address:AgentPreview'</a>, <a>agentPreview_ipv4Address</a>
--   - The IP address of the EC2 instance on which the Amazon Inspector
--   Agent is installed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentId:AgentPreview'</a>, <a>agentPreview_agentId</a> - The
--   ID of the EC2 instance where the agent is installed.
newAgentPreview :: Text -> AgentPreview

-- | The hostname of the EC2 instance on which the Amazon Inspector Agent
--   is installed.
agentPreview_hostname :: Lens' AgentPreview (Maybe Text)

-- | The version of the Amazon Inspector Agent.
agentPreview_agentVersion :: Lens' AgentPreview (Maybe Text)

-- | The kernel version of the operating system running on the EC2 instance
--   on which the Amazon Inspector Agent is installed.
agentPreview_kernelVersion :: Lens' AgentPreview (Maybe Text)

-- | The operating system running on the EC2 instance on which the Amazon
--   Inspector Agent is installed.
agentPreview_operatingSystem :: Lens' AgentPreview (Maybe Text)

-- | The health status of the Amazon Inspector Agent.
agentPreview_agentHealth :: Lens' AgentPreview (Maybe AgentHealth)

-- | The Auto Scaling group for the EC2 instance where the agent is
--   installed.
agentPreview_autoScalingGroup :: Lens' AgentPreview (Maybe Text)

-- | The IP address of the EC2 instance on which the Amazon Inspector Agent
--   is installed.
agentPreview_ipv4Address :: Lens' AgentPreview (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the EC2 instance where the agent is installed.
agentPreview_agentId :: Lens' AgentPreview Text

-- | A snapshot of an Amazon Inspector assessment run that contains the
--   findings of the assessment run .
--   
--   Used as the response element in the DescribeAssessmentRuns action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentRun</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentRun
AssessmentRun' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe POSIX -> Text -> Text -> Text -> AssessmentRunState -> Natural -> NonEmpty Text -> [Attribute] -> POSIX -> POSIX -> Bool -> [AssessmentRunStateChange] -> [AssessmentRunNotification] -> HashMap Severity Int -> AssessmentRun

-- | The time when StartAssessmentRun was called.
[$sel:startedAt:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The assessment run completion time that corresponds to the rules
--   packages evaluation completion time or failure.
[$sel:completedAt:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The ARN of the assessment run.
[$sel:arn:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> Text

-- | The auto-generated name for the assessment run.
[$sel:name:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> Text

-- | The ARN of the assessment template that is associated with the
--   assessment run.
[$sel:assessmentTemplateArn:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> Text

-- | The state of the assessment run.
[$sel:state:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> AssessmentRunState

-- | The duration of the assessment run.
[$sel:durationInSeconds:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> Natural

-- | The rules packages selected for the assessment run.
[$sel:rulesPackageArns:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> NonEmpty Text

-- | The user-defined attributes that are assigned to every generated
--   finding.
[$sel:userAttributesForFindings:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> [Attribute]

-- | The time when StartAssessmentRun was called.
[$sel:createdAt:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> POSIX

-- | The last time when the assessment run's state changed.
[$sel:stateChangedAt:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> POSIX

-- | A Boolean value (true or false) that specifies whether the process of
--   collecting data from the agents is completed.
[$sel:dataCollected:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> Bool

-- | A list of the assessment run state changes.
[$sel:stateChanges:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> [AssessmentRunStateChange]

-- | A list of notifications for the event subscriptions. A notification
--   about a particular generated finding is added to this list only once.
[$sel:notifications:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> [AssessmentRunNotification]

-- | Provides a total count of generated findings per severity.
[$sel:findingCounts:AssessmentRun'] :: AssessmentRun -> HashMap Severity Int

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentRun</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:startedAt:AssessmentRun'</a>, <a>assessmentRun_startedAt</a> -
--   The time when StartAssessmentRun was called.
--   
--   <a>$sel:completedAt:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_completedAt</a> - The assessment run completion time
--   that corresponds to the rules packages evaluation completion time or
--   failure.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:AssessmentRun'</a>, <a>assessmentRun_arn</a> - The ARN of
--   the assessment run.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssessmentRun'</a>, <a>assessmentRun_name</a> - The
--   auto-generated name for the assessment run.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentTemplateArn:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_assessmentTemplateArn</a> - The ARN of the assessment
--   template that is associated with the assessment run.
--   
--   <a>$sel:state:AssessmentRun'</a>, <a>assessmentRun_state</a> - The
--   state of the assessment run.
--   
--   <a>$sel:durationInSeconds:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_durationInSeconds</a> - The duration of the
--   assessment run.
--   
--   <a>$sel:rulesPackageArns:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_rulesPackageArns</a> - The rules packages selected
--   for the assessment run.
--   
--   <a>$sel:userAttributesForFindings:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_userAttributesForFindings</a> - The user-defined
--   attributes that are assigned to every generated finding.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdAt:AssessmentRun'</a>, <a>assessmentRun_createdAt</a> -
--   The time when StartAssessmentRun was called.
--   
--   <a>$sel:stateChangedAt:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_stateChangedAt</a> - The last time when the
--   assessment run's state changed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:dataCollected:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_dataCollected</a> - A Boolean value (true or false)
--   that specifies whether the process of collecting data from the agents
--   is completed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:stateChanges:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_stateChanges</a> - A list of the assessment run state
--   changes.
--   
--   <a>$sel:notifications:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_notifications</a> - A list of notifications for the
--   event subscriptions. A notification about a particular generated
--   finding is added to this list only once.
--   
--   <a>$sel:findingCounts:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_findingCounts</a> - Provides a total count of
--   generated findings per severity.
newAssessmentRun :: Text -> Text -> Text -> AssessmentRunState -> Natural -> NonEmpty Text -> UTCTime -> UTCTime -> Bool -> AssessmentRun

-- | The time when StartAssessmentRun was called.
assessmentRun_startedAt :: Lens' AssessmentRun (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The assessment run completion time that corresponds to the rules
--   packages evaluation completion time or failure.
assessmentRun_completedAt :: Lens' AssessmentRun (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The ARN of the assessment run.
assessmentRun_arn :: Lens' AssessmentRun Text

-- | The auto-generated name for the assessment run.
assessmentRun_name :: Lens' AssessmentRun Text

-- | The ARN of the assessment template that is associated with the
--   assessment run.
assessmentRun_assessmentTemplateArn :: Lens' AssessmentRun Text

-- | The state of the assessment run.
assessmentRun_state :: Lens' AssessmentRun AssessmentRunState

-- | The duration of the assessment run.
assessmentRun_durationInSeconds :: Lens' AssessmentRun Natural

-- | The rules packages selected for the assessment run.
assessmentRun_rulesPackageArns :: Lens' AssessmentRun (NonEmpty Text)

-- | The user-defined attributes that are assigned to every generated
--   finding.
assessmentRun_userAttributesForFindings :: Lens' AssessmentRun [Attribute]

-- | The time when StartAssessmentRun was called.
assessmentRun_createdAt :: Lens' AssessmentRun UTCTime

-- | The last time when the assessment run's state changed.
assessmentRun_stateChangedAt :: Lens' AssessmentRun UTCTime

-- | A Boolean value (true or false) that specifies whether the process of
--   collecting data from the agents is completed.
assessmentRun_dataCollected :: Lens' AssessmentRun Bool

-- | A list of the assessment run state changes.
assessmentRun_stateChanges :: Lens' AssessmentRun [AssessmentRunStateChange]

-- | A list of notifications for the event subscriptions. A notification
--   about a particular generated finding is added to this list only once.
assessmentRun_notifications :: Lens' AssessmentRun [AssessmentRunNotification]

-- | Provides a total count of generated findings per severity.
assessmentRun_findingCounts :: Lens' AssessmentRun (HashMap Severity Int)

-- | Contains information about an Amazon Inspector agent. This data type
--   is used as a response element in the ListAssessmentRunAgents action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentRunAgent</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentRunAgent
AssessmentRunAgent' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Text -> Text -> AgentHealth -> AgentHealthCode -> [TelemetryMetadata] -> AssessmentRunAgent

-- | The description for the agent health code.
[$sel:agentHealthDetails:AssessmentRunAgent'] :: AssessmentRunAgent -> Maybe Text

-- | The Auto Scaling group of the EC2 instance that is specified by the
--   agent ID.
[$sel:autoScalingGroup:AssessmentRunAgent'] :: AssessmentRunAgent -> Maybe Text

-- | The AWS account of the EC2 instance where the agent is installed.
[$sel:agentId:AssessmentRunAgent'] :: AssessmentRunAgent -> Text

-- | The ARN of the assessment run that is associated with the agent.
[$sel:assessmentRunArn:AssessmentRunAgent'] :: AssessmentRunAgent -> Text

-- | The current health state of the agent.
[$sel:agentHealth:AssessmentRunAgent'] :: AssessmentRunAgent -> AgentHealth

-- | The detailed health state of the agent.
[$sel:agentHealthCode:AssessmentRunAgent'] :: AssessmentRunAgent -> AgentHealthCode

-- | The Amazon Inspector application data metrics that are collected by
--   the agent.
[$sel:telemetryMetadata:AssessmentRunAgent'] :: AssessmentRunAgent -> [TelemetryMetadata]

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentRunAgent</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentHealthDetails:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_agentHealthDetails</a> - The description for the
--   agent health code.
--   
--   <a>$sel:autoScalingGroup:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_autoScalingGroup</a> - The Auto Scaling group of
--   the EC2 instance that is specified by the agent ID.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentId:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_agentId</a> - The AWS account of the EC2
--   instance where the agent is installed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentRunArn:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_assessmentRunArn</a> - The ARN of the assessment
--   run that is associated with the agent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentHealth:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_agentHealth</a> - The current health state of
--   the agent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentHealthCode:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_agentHealthCode</a> - The detailed health state
--   of the agent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:telemetryMetadata:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_telemetryMetadata</a> - The Amazon Inspector
--   application data metrics that are collected by the agent.
newAssessmentRunAgent :: Text -> Text -> AgentHealth -> AgentHealthCode -> AssessmentRunAgent

-- | The description for the agent health code.
assessmentRunAgent_agentHealthDetails :: Lens' AssessmentRunAgent (Maybe Text)

-- | The Auto Scaling group of the EC2 instance that is specified by the
--   agent ID.
assessmentRunAgent_autoScalingGroup :: Lens' AssessmentRunAgent (Maybe Text)

-- | The AWS account of the EC2 instance where the agent is installed.
assessmentRunAgent_agentId :: Lens' AssessmentRunAgent Text

-- | The ARN of the assessment run that is associated with the agent.
assessmentRunAgent_assessmentRunArn :: Lens' AssessmentRunAgent Text

-- | The current health state of the agent.
assessmentRunAgent_agentHealth :: Lens' AssessmentRunAgent AgentHealth

-- | The detailed health state of the agent.
assessmentRunAgent_agentHealthCode :: Lens' AssessmentRunAgent AgentHealthCode

-- | The Amazon Inspector application data metrics that are collected by
--   the agent.
assessmentRunAgent_telemetryMetadata :: Lens' AssessmentRunAgent [TelemetryMetadata]

-- | Used as the request parameter in the ListAssessmentRuns action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentRunFilter</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentRunFilter
AssessmentRunFilter' :: Maybe [AssessmentRunState] -> Maybe DurationRange -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe TimestampRange -> Maybe TimestampRange -> Maybe Text -> Maybe TimestampRange -> AssessmentRunFilter

-- | For a record to match a filter, one of the values specified for this
--   data type property must be the exact match of the value of the
--   <b>assessmentRunState</b> property of the AssessmentRun data type.
[$sel:states:AssessmentRunFilter'] :: AssessmentRunFilter -> Maybe [AssessmentRunState]

-- | For a record to match a filter, the value that is specified for this
--   data type property must inclusively match any value between the
--   specified minimum and maximum values of the <b>durationInSeconds</b>
--   property of the AssessmentRun data type.
[$sel:durationRange:AssessmentRunFilter'] :: AssessmentRunFilter -> Maybe DurationRange

-- | For a record to match a filter, the value that is specified for this
--   data type property must be contained in the list of values of the
--   <b>rulesPackages</b> property of the AssessmentRun data type.
[$sel:rulesPackageArns:AssessmentRunFilter'] :: AssessmentRunFilter -> Maybe [Text]

-- | For a record to match a filter, the value that is specified for this
--   data type property must match the <b>stateChangedAt</b> property of
--   the AssessmentRun data type.
[$sel:stateChangeTimeRange:AssessmentRunFilter'] :: AssessmentRunFilter -> Maybe TimestampRange

-- | For a record to match a filter, the value that is specified for this
--   data type property must inclusively match any value between the
--   specified minimum and maximum values of the <b>startTime</b> property
--   of the AssessmentRun data type.
[$sel:startTimeRange:AssessmentRunFilter'] :: AssessmentRunFilter -> Maybe TimestampRange

-- | For a record to match a filter, an explicit value or a string
--   containing a wildcard that is specified for this data type property
--   must match the value of the <b>assessmentRunName</b> property of the
--   AssessmentRun data type.
[$sel:namePattern:AssessmentRunFilter'] :: AssessmentRunFilter -> Maybe Text

-- | For a record to match a filter, the value that is specified for this
--   data type property must inclusively match any value between the
--   specified minimum and maximum values of the <b>completedAt</b>
--   property of the AssessmentRun data type.
[$sel:completionTimeRange:AssessmentRunFilter'] :: AssessmentRunFilter -> Maybe TimestampRange

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentRunFilter</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:states:AssessmentRunFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunFilter_states</a> - For a record to match a filter,
--   one of the values specified for this data type property must be the
--   exact match of the value of the <b>assessmentRunState</b> property of
--   the AssessmentRun data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:durationRange:AssessmentRunFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunFilter_durationRange</a> - For a record to match a
--   filter, the value that is specified for this data type property must
--   inclusively match any value between the specified minimum and maximum
--   values of the <b>durationInSeconds</b> property of the AssessmentRun
--   data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:rulesPackageArns:AssessmentRunFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunFilter_rulesPackageArns</a> - For a record to match a
--   filter, the value that is specified for this data type property must
--   be contained in the list of values of the <b>rulesPackages</b>
--   property of the AssessmentRun data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:stateChangeTimeRange:AssessmentRunFilter'</a>,

--   match a filter, the value that is specified for this data type
--   property must match the <b>stateChangedAt</b> property of the
--   AssessmentRun data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:startTimeRange:AssessmentRunFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunFilter_startTimeRange</a> - For a record to match a
--   filter, the value that is specified for this data type property must
--   inclusively match any value between the specified minimum and maximum
--   values of the <b>startTime</b> property of the AssessmentRun data
--   type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:namePattern:AssessmentRunFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunFilter_namePattern</a> - For a record to match a
--   filter, an explicit value or a string containing a wildcard that is
--   specified for this data type property must match the value of the
--   <b>assessmentRunName</b> property of the AssessmentRun data type.

--   <a>assessmentRunFilter_completionTimeRange</a> - For a record to match
--   a filter, the value that is specified for this data type property must
--   inclusively match any value between the specified minimum and maximum
--   values of the <b>completedAt</b> property of the AssessmentRun data
--   type.
newAssessmentRunFilter :: AssessmentRunFilter

-- | For a record to match a filter, one of the values specified for this
--   data type property must be the exact match of the value of the
--   <b>assessmentRunState</b> property of the AssessmentRun data type.
assessmentRunFilter_states :: Lens' AssessmentRunFilter (Maybe [AssessmentRunState])

--   data type property must inclusively match any value between the
--   specified minimum and maximum values of the <b>durationInSeconds</b>
--   property of the AssessmentRun data type.
assessmentRunFilter_durationRange :: Lens' AssessmentRunFilter (Maybe DurationRange)

-- | For a record to match a filter, the value that is specified for this
--   data type property must be contained in the list of values of the
--   <b>rulesPackages</b> property of the AssessmentRun data type.
assessmentRunFilter_rulesPackageArns :: Lens' AssessmentRunFilter (Maybe [Text])

--   data type property must match the <b>stateChangedAt</b> property of
--   the AssessmentRun data type.
assessmentRunFilter_stateChangeTimeRange :: Lens' AssessmentRunFilter (Maybe TimestampRange)

--   data type property must inclusively match any value between the
--   specified minimum and maximum values of the <b>startTime</b> property

assessmentRunFilter_startTimeRange :: Lens' AssessmentRunFilter (Maybe TimestampRange)

--   containing a wildcard that is specified for this data type property

--   AssessmentRun data type.
assessmentRunFilter_namePattern :: Lens' AssessmentRunFilter (Maybe Text)

--   data type property must inclusively match any value between the
--   specified minimum and maximum values of the <b>completedAt</b>
--   property of the AssessmentRun data type.
assessmentRunFilter_completionTimeRange :: Lens' AssessmentRunFilter (Maybe TimestampRange)

-- | Used as one of the elements of the AssessmentRun data type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentRunNotification</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentRunNotification
AssessmentRunNotification' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode -> Maybe Text -> POSIX -> InspectorEvent -> Bool -> AssessmentRunNotification

-- | The message included in the notification.
[$sel:message:AssessmentRunNotification'] :: AssessmentRunNotification -> Maybe Text

-- | The status code of the SNS notification.
[$sel:snsPublishStatusCode:AssessmentRunNotification'] :: AssessmentRunNotification -> Maybe AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode

-- | The SNS topic to which the SNS notification is sent.
[$sel:snsTopicArn:AssessmentRunNotification'] :: AssessmentRunNotification -> Maybe Text

-- | The date of the notification.
[$sel:date:AssessmentRunNotification'] :: AssessmentRunNotification -> POSIX

-- | The event for which a notification is sent.
[$sel:event:AssessmentRunNotification'] :: AssessmentRunNotification -> InspectorEvent

-- | The Boolean value that specifies whether the notification represents
--   an error.
[$sel:error:AssessmentRunNotification'] :: AssessmentRunNotification -> Bool

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentRunNotification</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:message:AssessmentRunNotification'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunNotification_message</a> - The message included in the
--   notification.
--   
--   <a>$sel:snsPublishStatusCode:AssessmentRunNotification'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunNotification_snsPublishStatusCode</a> - The status
--   code of the SNS notification.
--   
--   <a>$sel:snsTopicArn:AssessmentRunNotification'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunNotification_snsTopicArn</a> - The SNS topic to which
--   the SNS notification is sent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:date:AssessmentRunNotification'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunNotification_date</a> - The date of the notification.
--   
--   <a>$sel:event:AssessmentRunNotification'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunNotification_event</a> - The event for which a
--   notification is sent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:error:AssessmentRunNotification'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunNotification_error</a> - The Boolean value that
--   specifies whether the notification represents an error.
newAssessmentRunNotification :: UTCTime -> InspectorEvent -> Bool -> AssessmentRunNotification

-- | The message included in the notification.
assessmentRunNotification_message :: Lens' AssessmentRunNotification (Maybe Text)

-- | The status code of the SNS notification.
assessmentRunNotification_snsPublishStatusCode :: Lens' AssessmentRunNotification (Maybe AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode)

-- | The SNS topic to which the SNS notification is sent.
assessmentRunNotification_snsTopicArn :: Lens' AssessmentRunNotification (Maybe Text)

-- | The date of the notification.
assessmentRunNotification_date :: Lens' AssessmentRunNotification UTCTime

-- | The event for which a notification is sent.
assessmentRunNotification_event :: Lens' AssessmentRunNotification InspectorEvent

-- | The Boolean value that specifies whether the notification represents
--   an error.
assessmentRunNotification_error :: Lens' AssessmentRunNotification Bool

-- | Used as one of the elements of the AssessmentRun data type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentRunStateChange</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentRunStateChange
AssessmentRunStateChange' :: POSIX -> AssessmentRunState -> AssessmentRunStateChange

-- | The last time the assessment run state changed.
[$sel:stateChangedAt:AssessmentRunStateChange'] :: AssessmentRunStateChange -> POSIX

-- | The assessment run state.
[$sel:state:AssessmentRunStateChange'] :: AssessmentRunStateChange -> AssessmentRunState

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentRunStateChange</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:stateChangedAt:AssessmentRunStateChange'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunStateChange_stateChangedAt</a> - The last time the
--   assessment run state changed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:state:AssessmentRunStateChange'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunStateChange_state</a> - The assessment run state.
newAssessmentRunStateChange :: UTCTime -> AssessmentRunState -> AssessmentRunStateChange

-- | The last time the assessment run state changed.
assessmentRunStateChange_stateChangedAt :: Lens' AssessmentRunStateChange UTCTime

-- | The assessment run state.
assessmentRunStateChange_state :: Lens' AssessmentRunStateChange AssessmentRunState

-- | Contains information about an Amazon Inspector application. This data
--   type is used as the response element in the DescribeAssessmentTargets
--   action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentTarget</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentTarget
AssessmentTarget' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> Text -> POSIX -> POSIX -> AssessmentTarget

-- | The ARN that specifies the resource group that is associated with the
--   assessment target.
[$sel:resourceGroupArn:AssessmentTarget'] :: AssessmentTarget -> Maybe Text

-- | The ARN that specifies the Amazon Inspector assessment target.
[$sel:arn:AssessmentTarget'] :: AssessmentTarget -> Text

-- | The name of the Amazon Inspector assessment target.
[$sel:name:AssessmentTarget'] :: AssessmentTarget -> Text

-- | The time at which the assessment target is created.
[$sel:createdAt:AssessmentTarget'] :: AssessmentTarget -> POSIX

-- | The time at which UpdateAssessmentTarget is called.
[$sel:updatedAt:AssessmentTarget'] :: AssessmentTarget -> POSIX

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentTarget</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceGroupArn:AssessmentTarget'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTarget_resourceGroupArn</a> - The ARN that specifies the
--   resource group that is associated with the assessment target.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:AssessmentTarget'</a>, <a>assessmentTarget_arn</a> - The
--   ARN that specifies the Amazon Inspector assessment target.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssessmentTarget'</a>, <a>assessmentTarget_name</a> - The
--   name of the Amazon Inspector assessment target.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdAt:AssessmentTarget'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTarget_createdAt</a> - The time at which the assessment
--   target is created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:updatedAt:AssessmentTarget'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTarget_updatedAt</a> - The time at which
--   UpdateAssessmentTarget is called.
newAssessmentTarget :: Text -> Text -> UTCTime -> UTCTime -> AssessmentTarget

-- | The ARN that specifies the resource group that is associated with the
--   assessment target.
assessmentTarget_resourceGroupArn :: Lens' AssessmentTarget (Maybe Text)

-- | The ARN that specifies the Amazon Inspector assessment target.
assessmentTarget_arn :: Lens' AssessmentTarget Text

-- | The name of the Amazon Inspector assessment target.
assessmentTarget_name :: Lens' AssessmentTarget Text

-- | The time at which the assessment target is created.
assessmentTarget_createdAt :: Lens' AssessmentTarget UTCTime

-- | The time at which UpdateAssessmentTarget is called.
assessmentTarget_updatedAt :: Lens' AssessmentTarget UTCTime

-- | Used as the request parameter in the ListAssessmentTargets action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentTargetFilter</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentTargetFilter
AssessmentTargetFilter' :: Maybe Text -> AssessmentTargetFilter

-- | For a record to match a filter, an explicit value or a string that
--   contains a wildcard that is specified for this data type property must
--   match the value of the <b>assessmentTargetName</b> property of the
--   AssessmentTarget data type.
[$sel:assessmentTargetNamePattern:AssessmentTargetFilter'] :: AssessmentTargetFilter -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentTargetFilter</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentTargetNamePattern:AssessmentTargetFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTargetFilter_assessmentTargetNamePattern</a> - For a
--   record to match a filter, an explicit value or a string that contains
--   a wildcard that is specified for this data type property must match
--   the value of the <b>assessmentTargetName</b> property of the
--   AssessmentTarget data type.
newAssessmentTargetFilter :: AssessmentTargetFilter

-- | For a record to match a filter, an explicit value or a string that
--   contains a wildcard that is specified for this data type property must
--   match the value of the <b>assessmentTargetName</b> property of the
--   AssessmentTarget data type.
assessmentTargetFilter_assessmentTargetNamePattern :: Lens' AssessmentTargetFilter (Maybe Text)

-- | Contains information about an Amazon Inspector assessment template.
--   This data type is used as the response element in the
--   DescribeAssessmentTemplates action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentTemplate</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentTemplate
AssessmentTemplate' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Natural -> [Text] -> [Attribute] -> Int -> POSIX -> AssessmentTemplate

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the most recent assessment run
--   associated with this assessment template. This value exists only when
--   the value of assessmentRunCount is greaterpa than zero.
[$sel:lastAssessmentRunArn:AssessmentTemplate'] :: AssessmentTemplate -> Maybe Text

-- | The ARN of the assessment template.
[$sel:arn:AssessmentTemplate'] :: AssessmentTemplate -> Text

-- | The name of the assessment template.
[$sel:name:AssessmentTemplate'] :: AssessmentTemplate -> Text

-- | The ARN of the assessment target that corresponds to this assessment
--   template.
[$sel:assessmentTargetArn:AssessmentTemplate'] :: AssessmentTemplate -> Text

-- | The duration in seconds specified for this assessment template. The
--   default value is 3600 seconds (one hour). The maximum value is 86400
--   seconds (one day).
[$sel:durationInSeconds:AssessmentTemplate'] :: AssessmentTemplate -> Natural

-- | The rules packages that are specified for this assessment template.
[$sel:rulesPackageArns:AssessmentTemplate'] :: AssessmentTemplate -> [Text]

-- | The user-defined attributes that are assigned to every generated
--   finding from the assessment run that uses this assessment template.
[$sel:userAttributesForFindings:AssessmentTemplate'] :: AssessmentTemplate -> [Attribute]

-- | The number of existing assessment runs associated with this assessment
--   template. This value can be zero or a positive integer.
[$sel:assessmentRunCount:AssessmentTemplate'] :: AssessmentTemplate -> Int

-- | The time at which the assessment template is created.
[$sel:createdAt:AssessmentTemplate'] :: AssessmentTemplate -> POSIX

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentTemplate</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastAssessmentRunArn:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_lastAssessmentRunArn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) of the most recent assessment run associated with this
--   assessment template. This value exists only when the value of
--   assessmentRunCount is greaterpa than zero.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:AssessmentTemplate'</a>, <a>assessmentTemplate_arn</a> -
--   The ARN of the assessment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssessmentTemplate'</a>, <a>assessmentTemplate_name</a> -
--   The name of the assessment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentTargetArn:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_assessmentTargetArn</a> - The ARN of the
--   assessment target that corresponds to this assessment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:durationInSeconds:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_durationInSeconds</a> - The duration in seconds
--   specified for this assessment template. The default value is 3600
--   seconds (one hour). The maximum value is 86400 seconds (one day).
--   
--   <a>$sel:rulesPackageArns:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_rulesPackageArns</a> - The rules packages that
--   are specified for this assessment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:userAttributesForFindings:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_userAttributesForFindings</a> - The user-defined
--   attributes that are assigned to every generated finding from the
--   assessment run that uses this assessment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentRunCount:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_assessmentRunCount</a> - The number of existing
--   assessment runs associated with this assessment template. This value
--   can be zero or a positive integer.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdAt:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_createdAt</a> - The time at which the assessment
--   template is created.
newAssessmentTemplate :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Natural -> Int -> UTCTime -> AssessmentTemplate

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the most recent assessment run
--   associated with this assessment template. This value exists only when
--   the value of assessmentRunCount is greaterpa than zero.
assessmentTemplate_lastAssessmentRunArn :: Lens' AssessmentTemplate (Maybe Text)

-- | The ARN of the assessment template.
assessmentTemplate_arn :: Lens' AssessmentTemplate Text

-- | The name of the assessment template.
assessmentTemplate_name :: Lens' AssessmentTemplate Text

-- | The ARN of the assessment target that corresponds to this assessment
--   template.
assessmentTemplate_assessmentTargetArn :: Lens' AssessmentTemplate Text

-- | The duration in seconds specified for this assessment template. The
--   default value is 3600 seconds (one hour). The maximum value is 86400
--   seconds (one day).
assessmentTemplate_durationInSeconds :: Lens' AssessmentTemplate Natural

-- | The rules packages that are specified for this assessment template.
assessmentTemplate_rulesPackageArns :: Lens' AssessmentTemplate [Text]

-- | The user-defined attributes that are assigned to every generated
--   finding from the assessment run that uses this assessment template.
assessmentTemplate_userAttributesForFindings :: Lens' AssessmentTemplate [Attribute]

-- | The number of existing assessment runs associated with this assessment
--   template. This value can be zero or a positive integer.
assessmentTemplate_assessmentRunCount :: Lens' AssessmentTemplate Int

-- | The time at which the assessment template is created.
assessmentTemplate_createdAt :: Lens' AssessmentTemplate UTCTime

-- | Used as the request parameter in the ListAssessmentTemplates action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentTemplateFilter</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentTemplateFilter
AssessmentTemplateFilter' :: Maybe DurationRange -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> AssessmentTemplateFilter

-- | For a record to match a filter, the value specified for this data type
--   property must inclusively match any value between the specified
--   minimum and maximum values of the <b>durationInSeconds</b> property of
--   the AssessmentTemplate data type.
[$sel:durationRange:AssessmentTemplateFilter'] :: AssessmentTemplateFilter -> Maybe DurationRange

-- | For a record to match a filter, the values that are specified for this
--   data type property must be contained in the list of values of the
--   <b>rulesPackageArns</b> property of the AssessmentTemplate data type.
[$sel:rulesPackageArns:AssessmentTemplateFilter'] :: AssessmentTemplateFilter -> Maybe [Text]

-- | For a record to match a filter, an explicit value or a string that
--   contains a wildcard that is specified for this data type property must
--   match the value of the <b>assessmentTemplateName</b> property of the
--   AssessmentTemplate data type.
[$sel:namePattern:AssessmentTemplateFilter'] :: AssessmentTemplateFilter -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentTemplateFilter</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:durationRange:AssessmentTemplateFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplateFilter_durationRange</a> - For a record to match
--   a filter, the value specified for this data type property must
--   inclusively match any value between the specified minimum and maximum
--   values of the <b>durationInSeconds</b> property of the
--   AssessmentTemplate data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:rulesPackageArns:AssessmentTemplateFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplateFilter_rulesPackageArns</a> - For a record to
--   match a filter, the values that are specified for this data type
--   property must be contained in the list of values of the
--   <b>rulesPackageArns</b> property of the AssessmentTemplate data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:namePattern:AssessmentTemplateFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplateFilter_namePattern</a> - For a record to match a
--   filter, an explicit value or a string that contains a wildcard that is
--   specified for this data type property must match the value of the
--   <b>assessmentTemplateName</b> property of the AssessmentTemplate data
--   type.
newAssessmentTemplateFilter :: AssessmentTemplateFilter

-- | For a record to match a filter, the value specified for this data type
--   property must inclusively match any value between the specified
--   minimum and maximum values of the <b>durationInSeconds</b> property of
--   the AssessmentTemplate data type.
assessmentTemplateFilter_durationRange :: Lens' AssessmentTemplateFilter (Maybe DurationRange)

-- | For a record to match a filter, the values that are specified for this
--   data type property must be contained in the list of values of the
--   <b>rulesPackageArns</b> property of the AssessmentTemplate data type.
assessmentTemplateFilter_rulesPackageArns :: Lens' AssessmentTemplateFilter (Maybe [Text])

-- | For a record to match a filter, an explicit value or a string that
--   contains a wildcard that is specified for this data type property must
--   match the value of the <b>assessmentTemplateName</b> property of the
--   AssessmentTemplate data type.
assessmentTemplateFilter_namePattern :: Lens' AssessmentTemplateFilter (Maybe Text)

-- | A collection of attributes of the host from which the finding is
--   generated.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssetAttributes</a> smart constructor.
data AssetAttributes
AssetAttributes' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe [Tag] -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe [NetworkInterface] -> Maybe Text -> Natural -> AssetAttributes

-- | The hostname of the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
[$sel:hostname:AssetAttributes'] :: AssetAttributes -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of the agent that is installed on the EC2 instance where the
--   finding is generated.
[$sel:agentId:AssetAttributes'] :: AssetAttributes -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of the Amazon Machine Image (AMI) that is installed on the EC2
--   instance where the finding is generated.
[$sel:amiId:AssetAttributes'] :: AssetAttributes -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags related to the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
[$sel:tags:AssetAttributes'] :: AssetAttributes -> Maybe [Tag]

-- | The list of IP v4 addresses of the EC2 instance where the finding is
--   generated.
[$sel:ipv4Addresses:AssetAttributes'] :: AssetAttributes -> Maybe [Text]

-- | An array of the network interfaces interacting with the EC2 instance
--   where the finding is generated.
[$sel:networkInterfaces:AssetAttributes'] :: AssetAttributes -> Maybe [NetworkInterface]

-- | The Auto Scaling group of the EC2 instance where the finding is
--   generated.
[$sel:autoScalingGroup:AssetAttributes'] :: AssetAttributes -> Maybe Text

-- | The schema version of this data type.
[$sel:schemaVersion:AssetAttributes'] :: AssetAttributes -> Natural

-- | Create a value of <a>AssetAttributes</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:hostname:AssetAttributes'</a>, <a>assetAttributes_hostname</a>
--   - The hostname of the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentId:AssetAttributes'</a>, <a>assetAttributes_agentId</a> -
--   The ID of the agent that is installed on the EC2 instance where the
--   finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:amiId:AssetAttributes'</a>, <a>assetAttributes_amiId</a> - The
--   ID of the Amazon Machine Image (AMI) that is installed on the EC2
--   instance where the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:AssetAttributes'</a>, <a>assetAttributes_tags</a> - The
--   tags related to the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:ipv4Addresses:AssetAttributes'</a>,
--   <a>assetAttributes_ipv4Addresses</a> - The list of IP v4 addresses of
--   the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:networkInterfaces:AssetAttributes'</a>,
--   <a>assetAttributes_networkInterfaces</a> - An array of the network
--   interfaces interacting with the EC2 instance where the finding is
--   generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:autoScalingGroup:AssetAttributes'</a>,
--   <a>assetAttributes_autoScalingGroup</a> - The Auto Scaling group of
--   the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:schemaVersion:AssetAttributes'</a>,
--   <a>assetAttributes_schemaVersion</a> - The schema version of this data
--   type.
newAssetAttributes :: Natural -> AssetAttributes

-- | The hostname of the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
assetAttributes_hostname :: Lens' AssetAttributes (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the agent that is installed on the EC2 instance where the
--   finding is generated.
assetAttributes_agentId :: Lens' AssetAttributes (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the Amazon Machine Image (AMI) that is installed on the EC2
--   instance where the finding is generated.
assetAttributes_amiId :: Lens' AssetAttributes (Maybe Text)

-- | The tags related to the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
assetAttributes_tags :: Lens' AssetAttributes (Maybe [Tag])

-- | The list of IP v4 addresses of the EC2 instance where the finding is
--   generated.
assetAttributes_ipv4Addresses :: Lens' AssetAttributes (Maybe [Text])

-- | An array of the network interfaces interacting with the EC2 instance
--   where the finding is generated.
assetAttributes_networkInterfaces :: Lens' AssetAttributes (Maybe [NetworkInterface])

-- | The Auto Scaling group of the EC2 instance where the finding is
--   generated.
assetAttributes_autoScalingGroup :: Lens' AssetAttributes (Maybe Text)

-- | The schema version of this data type.
assetAttributes_schemaVersion :: Lens' AssetAttributes Natural

-- | This data type is used as a request parameter in the
--   AddAttributesToFindings and CreateAssessmentTemplate actions.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAttribute</a> smart constructor.
data Attribute
Attribute' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> Attribute

-- | The value assigned to the attribute key.
[$sel:value:Attribute'] :: Attribute -> Maybe Text

-- | The attribute key.
[$sel:key:Attribute'] :: Attribute -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Attribute</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:Attribute'</a>, <a>attribute_value</a> - The value
--   assigned to the attribute key.
--   
--   <a>$sel:key:Attribute'</a>, <a>attribute_key</a> - The attribute key.
newAttribute :: Text -> Attribute

-- | The value assigned to the attribute key.
attribute_value :: Lens' Attribute (Maybe Text)

-- | The attribute key.
attribute_key :: Lens' Attribute Text

-- | This data type is used in the AssessmentTemplateFilter data type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDurationRange</a> smart constructor.
data DurationRange
DurationRange' :: Maybe Natural -> Maybe Natural -> DurationRange

-- | The minimum value of the duration range. Must be greater than zero.
[$sel:minSeconds:DurationRange'] :: DurationRange -> Maybe Natural

-- | The maximum value of the duration range. Must be less than or equal to
--   604800 seconds (1 week).
[$sel:maxSeconds:DurationRange'] :: DurationRange -> Maybe Natural

-- | Create a value of <a>DurationRange</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:minSeconds:DurationRange'</a>, <a>durationRange_minSeconds</a>
--   - The minimum value of the duration range. Must be greater than zero.
--   
--   <a>$sel:maxSeconds:DurationRange'</a>, <a>durationRange_maxSeconds</a>
--   - The maximum value of the duration range. Must be less than or equal
--   to 604800 seconds (1 week).
newDurationRange :: DurationRange

-- | The minimum value of the duration range. Must be greater than zero.
durationRange_minSeconds :: Lens' DurationRange (Maybe Natural)

-- | The maximum value of the duration range. Must be less than or equal to
--   604800 seconds (1 week).
durationRange_maxSeconds :: Lens' DurationRange (Maybe Natural)

-- | This data type is used in the Subscription data type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newEventSubscription</a> smart constructor.
data EventSubscription
EventSubscription' :: InspectorEvent -> POSIX -> EventSubscription

-- | The event for which Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS)
--   notifications are sent.
[$sel:event:EventSubscription'] :: EventSubscription -> InspectorEvent

-- | The time at which SubscribeToEvent is called.
[$sel:subscribedAt:EventSubscription'] :: EventSubscription -> POSIX

-- | Create a value of <a>EventSubscription</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:event:EventSubscription'</a>, <a>eventSubscription_event</a> -
--   The event for which Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS)
--   notifications are sent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:subscribedAt:EventSubscription'</a>,
--   <a>eventSubscription_subscribedAt</a> - The time at which
--   SubscribeToEvent is called.
newEventSubscription :: InspectorEvent -> UTCTime -> EventSubscription

-- | The event for which Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS)
--   notifications are sent.
eventSubscription_event :: Lens' EventSubscription InspectorEvent

-- | The time at which SubscribeToEvent is called.
eventSubscription_subscribedAt :: Lens' EventSubscription UTCTime

-- | Contains information about what was excluded from an assessment run.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExclusion</a> smart constructor.
data Exclusion
Exclusion' :: Maybe [Attribute] -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> NonEmpty Scope -> Exclusion

-- | The system-defined attributes for the exclusion.
[$sel:attributes:Exclusion'] :: Exclusion -> Maybe [Attribute]

-- | The ARN that specifies the exclusion.
[$sel:arn:Exclusion'] :: Exclusion -> Text

-- | The name of the exclusion.
[$sel:title:Exclusion'] :: Exclusion -> Text

-- | The description of the exclusion.
[$sel:description:Exclusion'] :: Exclusion -> Text

-- | The recommendation for the exclusion.
[$sel:recommendation:Exclusion'] :: Exclusion -> Text

-- | The AWS resources for which the exclusion pertains.
[$sel:scopes:Exclusion'] :: Exclusion -> NonEmpty Scope

-- | Create a value of <a>Exclusion</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:attributes:Exclusion'</a>, <a>exclusion_attributes</a> - The
--   system-defined attributes for the exclusion.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:Exclusion'</a>, <a>exclusion_arn</a> - The ARN that
--   specifies the exclusion.
--   
--   <a>$sel:title:Exclusion'</a>, <a>exclusion_title</a> - The name of the
--   exclusion.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:Exclusion'</a>, <a>exclusion_description</a> - The
--   description of the exclusion.
--   
--   <a>$sel:recommendation:Exclusion'</a>, <a>exclusion_recommendation</a>
--   - The recommendation for the exclusion.
--   
--   <a>$sel:scopes:Exclusion'</a>, <a>exclusion_scopes</a> - The AWS
--   resources for which the exclusion pertains.
newExclusion :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> NonEmpty Scope -> Exclusion

-- | The system-defined attributes for the exclusion.
exclusion_attributes :: Lens' Exclusion (Maybe [Attribute])

-- | The ARN that specifies the exclusion.
exclusion_arn :: Lens' Exclusion Text

-- | The name of the exclusion.
exclusion_title :: Lens' Exclusion Text

-- | The description of the exclusion.
exclusion_description :: Lens' Exclusion Text

-- | The recommendation for the exclusion.
exclusion_recommendation :: Lens' Exclusion Text

-- | The AWS resources for which the exclusion pertains.
exclusion_scopes :: Lens' Exclusion (NonEmpty Scope)

-- | Contains information about what is excluded from an assessment run
--   given the current state of the assessment template.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExclusionPreview</a> smart constructor.
data ExclusionPreview
ExclusionPreview' :: Maybe [Attribute] -> Text -> Text -> Text -> NonEmpty Scope -> ExclusionPreview

-- | The system-defined attributes for the exclusion preview.
[$sel:attributes:ExclusionPreview'] :: ExclusionPreview -> Maybe [Attribute]

-- | The name of the exclusion preview.
[$sel:title:ExclusionPreview'] :: ExclusionPreview -> Text

-- | The description of the exclusion preview.
[$sel:description:ExclusionPreview'] :: ExclusionPreview -> Text

-- | The recommendation for the exclusion preview.
[$sel:recommendation:ExclusionPreview'] :: ExclusionPreview -> Text

-- | The AWS resources for which the exclusion preview pertains.
[$sel:scopes:ExclusionPreview'] :: ExclusionPreview -> NonEmpty Scope

-- | Create a value of <a>ExclusionPreview</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--

--   <a>exclusionPreview_attributes</a> - The system-defined attributes for
--   the exclusion preview.
--   
--   <a>$sel:title:ExclusionPreview'</a>, <a>exclusionPreview_title</a> -
--   The name of the exclusion preview.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:ExclusionPreview'</a>,
--   <a>exclusionPreview_description</a> - The description of the exclusion
--   preview.
--   
--   <a>$sel:recommendation:ExclusionPreview'</a>,
--   <a>exclusionPreview_recommendation</a> - The recommendation for the
--   exclusion preview.
--   
--   <a>$sel:scopes:ExclusionPreview'</a>, <a>exclusionPreview_scopes</a> -
--   The AWS resources for which the exclusion preview pertains.
newExclusionPreview :: Text -> Text -> Text -> NonEmpty Scope -> ExclusionPreview

exclusionPreview_attributes :: Lens' ExclusionPreview (Maybe [Attribute])

-- | The description of the exclusion preview.

-- | The recommendation for the exclusion preview.
