newtype AgentHealth
AgentHealth' :: Text -> AgentHealth
[fromAgentHealth] :: AgentHealth -> Text
pattern AgentHealth_HEALTHY :: AgentHealth
pattern AgentHealth_UNHEALTHY :: AgentHealth
pattern AgentHealth_UNKNOWN :: AgentHealth
newtype AgentHealthCode
AgentHealthCode' :: Text -> AgentHealthCode
[fromAgentHealthCode] :: AgentHealthCode -> Text
pattern AgentHealthCode_IDLE :: AgentHealthCode
pattern AgentHealthCode_RUNNING :: AgentHealthCode
pattern AgentHealthCode_SHUTDOWN :: AgentHealthCode
pattern AgentHealthCode_THROTTLED :: AgentHealthCode
pattern AgentHealthCode_UNHEALTHY :: AgentHealthCode
pattern AgentHealthCode_UNKNOWN :: AgentHealthCode
newtype AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode
AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode' :: Text -> AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode
[fromAssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode] :: AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode -> Text
pattern AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode_ACCESS_DENIED :: AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode
pattern AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode_INTERNAL_ERROR :: AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode
pattern AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode_SUCCESS :: AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode
pattern AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode_TOPIC_DOES_NOT_EXIST :: AssessmentRunNotificationSnsStatusCode
newtype AssessmentRunState
AssessmentRunState' :: Text -> AssessmentRunState
[fromAssessmentRunState] :: AssessmentRunState -> Text
pattern AssessmentRunState_CANCELED :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_COLLECTING_DATA :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_COMPLETED :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_COMPLETED_WITH_ERRORS :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_CREATED :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_DATA_COLLECTED :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_ERROR :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_EVALUATING_RULES :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_FAILED :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_START_DATA_COLLECTION_IN_PROGRESS :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_START_DATA_COLLECTION_PENDING :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_START_EVALUATING_RULES_PENDING :: AssessmentRunState
pattern AssessmentRunState_STOP_DATA_COLLECTION_PENDING :: AssessmentRunState

[fromAssetType] :: AssetType -> Text
pattern AssetType_Ec2_instance :: AssetType

-- | Contains information about an Amazon Inspector agent. This data type
--   is used as a request parameter in the ListAssessmentRunAgents action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAgentFilter</a> smart constructor.
data AgentFilter
AgentFilter' :: [AgentHealth] -> [AgentHealthCode] -> AgentFilter

-- | Create a value of <a>AgentFilter</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentHealths:AgentFilter'</a>, <a>agentFilter_agentHealths</a>
--   - The current health state of the agent. Values can be set to
--   <b>HEALTHY</b> or <b>UNHEALTHY</b>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentHealthCodes:AgentFilter'</a>,
--   <a>agentFilter_agentHealthCodes</a> - The detailed health state of the
--   agent. Values can be set to <b>IDLE</b>, <b>RUNNING</b>,
--   <b>SHUTDOWN</b>, <b>UNHEALTHY</b>, <b>THROTTLED</b>, and
--   <b>UNKNOWN</b>.
newAgentFilter :: AgentFilter

-- | Used as a response element in the PreviewAgents action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAgentPreview</a> smart constructor.
data AgentPreview
AgentPreview' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe AgentHealth -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Text -> AgentPreview

-- | Create a value of <a>AgentPreview</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:hostname:AgentPreview'</a>, <a>agentPreview_hostname</a> - The
--   hostname of the EC2 instance on which the Amazon Inspector Agent is
--   installed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentVersion:AgentPreview'</a>,
--   <a>agentPreview_agentVersion</a> - The version of the Amazon Inspector
--   Agent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:kernelVersion:AgentPreview'</a>,
--   <a>agentPreview_kernelVersion</a> - The kernel version of the
--   operating system running on the EC2 instance on which the Amazon
--   Inspector Agent is installed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:operatingSystem:AgentPreview'</a>,
--   <a>agentPreview_operatingSystem</a> - The operating system running on
--   the EC2 instance on which the Amazon Inspector Agent is installed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentHealth:AgentPreview'</a>, <a>agentPreview_agentHealth</a>
--   - The health status of the Amazon Inspector Agent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:autoScalingGroup:AgentPreview'</a>,
--   <a>agentPreview_autoScalingGroup</a> - The Auto Scaling group for the
--   EC2 instance where the agent is installed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:ipv4Address:AgentPreview'</a>, <a>agentPreview_ipv4Address</a>
--   - The IP address of the EC2 instance on which the Amazon Inspector
--   Agent is installed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentId:AgentPreview'</a>, <a>agentPreview_agentId</a> - The
--   ID of the EC2 instance where the agent is installed.
newAgentPreview :: Text -> AgentPreview

-- | A snapshot of an Amazon Inspector assessment run that contains the
--   findings of the assessment run .
--   
--   Used as the response element in the DescribeAssessmentRuns action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentRun</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentRun
AssessmentRun' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe POSIX -> Text -> Text -> Text -> AssessmentRunState -> Natural -> NonEmpty Text -> [Attribute] -> POSIX -> POSIX -> Bool -> [AssessmentRunStateChange] -> [AssessmentRunNotification] -> HashMap Severity Int -> AssessmentRun

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentRun</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:startedAt:AssessmentRun'</a>, <a>assessmentRun_startedAt</a> -
--   The time when StartAssessmentRun was called.
--   
--   <a>$sel:completedAt:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_completedAt</a> - The assessment run completion time
--   that corresponds to the rules packages evaluation completion time or
--   failure.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:AssessmentRun'</a>, <a>assessmentRun_arn</a> - The ARN of
--   the assessment run.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssessmentRun'</a>, <a>assessmentRun_name</a> - The
--   auto-generated name for the assessment run.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentTemplateArn:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_assessmentTemplateArn</a> - The ARN of the assessment
--   template that is associated with the assessment run.
--   
--   <a>$sel:state:AssessmentRun'</a>, <a>assessmentRun_state</a> - The
--   state of the assessment run.
--   
--   <a>$sel:durationInSeconds:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_durationInSeconds</a> - The duration of the
--   assessment run.
--   
--   <a>$sel:rulesPackageArns:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_rulesPackageArns</a> - The rules packages selected
--   for the assessment run.
--   
--   <a>$sel:userAttributesForFindings:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_userAttributesForFindings</a> - The user-defined
--   attributes that are assigned to every generated finding.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdAt:AssessmentRun'</a>, <a>assessmentRun_createdAt</a> -
--   The time when StartAssessmentRun was called.
--   
--   <a>$sel:stateChangedAt:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_stateChangedAt</a> - The last time when the
--   assessment run's state changed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:dataCollected:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_dataCollected</a> - A Boolean value (true or false)
--   that specifies whether the process of collecting data from the agents
--   is completed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:stateChanges:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_stateChanges</a> - A list of the assessment run state
--   changes.
--   
--   <a>$sel:notifications:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_notifications</a> - A list of notifications for the
--   event subscriptions. A notification about a particular generated
--   finding is added to this list only once.
--   
--   <a>$sel:findingCounts:AssessmentRun'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRun_findingCounts</a> - Provides a total count of
--   generated findings per severity.
newAssessmentRun :: Text -> Text -> Text -> AssessmentRunState -> Natural -> NonEmpty Text -> UTCTime -> UTCTime -> Bool -> AssessmentRun

-- | Contains information about an Amazon Inspector agent. This data type
--   is used as a response element in the ListAssessmentRunAgents action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentRunAgent</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentRunAgent
AssessmentRunAgent' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Text -> Text -> AgentHealth -> AgentHealthCode -> [TelemetryMetadata] -> AssessmentRunAgent

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentRunAgent</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentHealthDetails:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_agentHealthDetails</a> - The description for the
--   agent health code.
--   
--   <a>$sel:autoScalingGroup:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_autoScalingGroup</a> - The Auto Scaling group of
--   the EC2 instance that is specified by the agent ID.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentId:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_agentId</a> - The AWS account of the EC2
--   instance where the agent is installed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentRunArn:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_assessmentRunArn</a> - The ARN of the assessment
--   run that is associated with the agent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentHealth:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_agentHealth</a> - The current health state of
--   the agent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentHealthCode:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_agentHealthCode</a> - The detailed health state
--   of the agent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:telemetryMetadata:AssessmentRunAgent'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunAgent_telemetryMetadata</a> - The Amazon Inspector
--   application data metrics that are collected by the agent.
newAssessmentRunAgent :: Text -> Text -> AgentHealth -> AgentHealthCode -> AssessmentRunAgent

-- | Used as the request parameter in the ListAssessmentRuns action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentRunFilter</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentRunFilter
AssessmentRunFilter' :: Maybe [AssessmentRunState] -> Maybe DurationRange -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe TimestampRange -> Maybe TimestampRange -> Maybe Text -> Maybe TimestampRange -> AssessmentRunFilter

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentRunFilter</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:states:AssessmentRunFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunFilter_states</a> - For a record to match a filter,
--   one of the values specified for this data type property must be the
--   exact match of the value of the <b>assessmentRunState</b> property of
--   the AssessmentRun data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:durationRange:AssessmentRunFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunFilter_durationRange</a> - For a record to match a
--   filter, the value that is specified for this data type property must
--   inclusively match any value between the specified minimum and maximum
--   values of the <b>durationInSeconds</b> property of the AssessmentRun
--   data type.

--   <a>assessmentRunFilter_rulesPackageArns</a> - For a record to match a
--   filter, the value that is specified for this data type property must
--   be contained in the list of values of the <b>rulesPackages</b>
--   property of the AssessmentRun data type.

--   <a>assessmentRunFilter_stateChangeTimeRange</a> - For a record to
--   match a filter, the value that is specified for this data type
--   property must match the <b>stateChangedAt</b> property of the
--   AssessmentRun data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:startTimeRange:AssessmentRunFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunFilter_startTimeRange</a> - For a record to match a
--   filter, the value that is specified for this data type property must
--   inclusively match any value between the specified minimum and maximum
--   values of the <b>startTime</b> property of the AssessmentRun data
--   type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:namePattern:AssessmentRunFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunFilter_namePattern</a> - For a record to match a
--   filter, an explicit value or a string containing a wildcard that is
--   specified for this data type property must match the value of the
--   <b>assessmentRunName</b> property of the AssessmentRun data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:completionTimeRange:AssessmentRunFilter'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentRunFilter_completionTimeRange</a> - For a record to match
--   a filter, the value that is specified for this data type property must
--   inclusively match any value between the specified minimum and maximum
--   values of the <b>completedAt</b> property of the AssessmentRun data
--   type.
newAssessmentRunFilter :: AssessmentRunFilter

-- | Contains information about an Amazon Inspector assessment template.
--   This data type is used as the response element in the
--   DescribeAssessmentTemplates action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentTemplate</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentTemplate
AssessmentTemplate' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Natural -> [Text] -> [Attribute] -> Int -> POSIX -> AssessmentTemplate

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentTemplate</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastAssessmentRunArn:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_lastAssessmentRunArn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) of the most recent assessment run associated with this
--   assessment template. This value exists only when the value of
--   assessmentRunCount is greaterpa than zero.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:AssessmentTemplate'</a>, <a>assessmentTemplate_arn</a> -
--   The ARN of the assessment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssessmentTemplate'</a>, <a>assessmentTemplate_name</a> -
--   The name of the assessment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentTargetArn:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_assessmentTargetArn</a> - The ARN of the
--   assessment target that corresponds to this assessment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:durationInSeconds:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_durationInSeconds</a> - The duration in seconds
--   specified for this assessment template. The default value is 3600
--   seconds (one hour). The maximum value is 86400 seconds (one day).
--   
--   <a>$sel:rulesPackageArns:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_rulesPackageArns</a> - The rules packages that
--   are specified for this assessment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:userAttributesForFindings:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_userAttributesForFindings</a> - The user-defined
--   attributes that are assigned to every generated finding from the
--   assessment run that uses this assessment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentRunCount:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_assessmentRunCount</a> - The number of existing
--   assessment runs associated with this assessment template. This value
--   can be zero or a positive integer.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdAt:AssessmentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentTemplate_createdAt</a> - The time at which the assessment
--   template is created.
newAssessmentTemplate :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Natural -> Int -> UTCTime -> AssessmentTemplate

--   a filter, the value specified for this data type property must
--   inclusively match any value between the specified minimum and maximum
--   values of the <b>durationInSeconds</b> property of the
--   AssessmentTemplate data type.

-- | A collection of attributes of the host from which the finding is
--   generated.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssetAttributes</a> smart constructor.
data AssetAttributes
AssetAttributes' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe [Tag] -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe [NetworkInterface] -> Maybe Text -> Natural -> AssetAttributes

-- | Create a value of <a>AssetAttributes</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:hostname:AssetAttributes'</a>, <a>assetAttributes_hostname</a>
--   - The hostname of the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentId:AssetAttributes'</a>, <a>assetAttributes_agentId</a> -
--   The ID of the agent that is installed on the EC2 instance where the
--   finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:amiId:AssetAttributes'</a>, <a>assetAttributes_amiId</a> - The
--   ID of the Amazon Machine Image (AMI) that is installed on the EC2
--   instance where the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:AssetAttributes'</a>, <a>assetAttributes_tags</a> - The
--   tags related to the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:ipv4Addresses:AssetAttributes'</a>,
--   <a>assetAttributes_ipv4Addresses</a> - The list of IP v4 addresses of
--   the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:networkInterfaces:AssetAttributes'</a>,
--   <a>assetAttributes_networkInterfaces</a> - An array of the network
--   interfaces interacting with the EC2 instance where the finding is
--   generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:autoScalingGroup:AssetAttributes'</a>,
--   <a>assetAttributes_autoScalingGroup</a> - The Auto Scaling group of
--   the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:schemaVersion:AssetAttributes'</a>,
--   <a>assetAttributes_schemaVersion</a> - The schema version of this data
--   type.
newAssetAttributes :: Natural -> AssetAttributes

-- | This data type is used as a request parameter in the
--   AddAttributesToFindings and CreateAssessmentTemplate actions.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAttribute</a> smart constructor.
data Attribute

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   assigned to the attribute key.
--   
--   <a>$sel:key:Attribute'</a>, <a>attribute_key</a> - The attribute key.
newAttribute :: Text -> Attribute

-- | This data type is used in the AssessmentTemplateFilter data type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDurationRange</a> smart constructor.
data DurationRange

--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   - The minimum value of the duration range. Must be greater than zero.
--   
--   <a>$sel:maxSeconds:DurationRange'</a>, <a>durationRange_maxSeconds</a>
--   - The maximum value of the duration range. Must be less than or equal
--   to 604800 seconds (1 week).
newDurationRange :: DurationRange

-- | Contains information about what was excluded from an assessment run.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExclusion</a> smart constructor.
data Exclusion

-- | Create a value of <a>Exclusion</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   system-defined attributes for the exclusion.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:Exclusion'</a>, <a>exclusion_arn</a> - The ARN that
--   specifies the exclusion.
--   
--   <a>$sel:title:Exclusion'</a>, <a>exclusion_title</a> - The name of the
--   exclusion.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:Exclusion'</a>, <a>exclusion_description</a> - The
--   description of the exclusion.
--   
--   <a>$sel:recommendation:Exclusion'</a>, <a>exclusion_recommendation</a>
--   - The recommendation for the exclusion.
--   
--   <a>$sel:scopes:Exclusion'</a>, <a>exclusion_scopes</a> - The AWS
--   resources for which the exclusion pertains.
newExclusion :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> NonEmpty Scope -> Exclusion

-- | Includes details about the failed items.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newFailedItemDetails</a> smart constructor.
data FailedItemDetails

-- | Create a value of <a>FailedItemDetails</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   item.

--   <a>failedItemDetails_retryable</a> - Indicates whether you can
--   immediately retry a request for this item for a specified resource.
newFailedItemDetails :: FailedItemErrorCode -> Bool -> FailedItemDetails

-- | Contains information about an Amazon Inspector finding. This data type
--   is used as the response element in the DescribeFindings action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newFinding</a> smart constructor.
data Finding
Finding' :: Maybe AssetAttributes -> Maybe Severity -> Maybe AssetType -> Maybe Double -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe InspectorServiceAttributes -> Maybe Natural -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Natural -> Text -> [Attribute] -> [Attribute] -> POSIX -> POSIX -> Finding

-- | Create a value of <a>Finding</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:assetAttributes:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_assetAttributes</a> -
--   A collection of attributes of the host from which the finding is
--   generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:severity:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_severity</a> - The finding
--   severity. Values can be set to High, Medium, Low, and Informational.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assetType:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_assetType</a> - The type of
--   the host from which the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:numericSeverity:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_numericSeverity</a> -
--   The numeric value of the finding severity.
--   
--   <a>$sel:title:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_title</a> - The name of the
--   finding.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_id</a> - The ID of the finding.
--   
--   <a>$sel:service:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_service</a> - The data
--   element is set to "Inspector".
--   
--   <a>$sel:serviceAttributes:Finding'</a>,
--   <a>finding_serviceAttributes</a> - This data type is used in the
--   Finding data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:confidence:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_confidence</a> - This data
--   element is currently not used.
--   
--   <a>$sel:recommendation:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_recommendation</a> -
--   The recommendation for the finding.
--   
--   <a>$sel:indicatorOfCompromise:Finding'</a>,
--   <a>finding_indicatorOfCompromise</a> - This data element is currently
--   not used.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_description</a> - The
--   description of the finding.
--   
--   <a>$sel:schemaVersion:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_schemaVersion</a> - The
--   schema version of this data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_arn</a> - The ARN that specifies
--   the finding.
--   
--   <a>$sel:attributes:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_attributes</a> - The
--   system-defined attributes for the finding.
--   
--   <a>$sel:userAttributes:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_userAttributes</a> -
--   The user-defined attributes that are assigned to the finding.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdAt:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_createdAt</a> - The time
--   when the finding was generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:updatedAt:Finding'</a>, <a>finding_updatedAt</a> - The time
--   when AddAttributesToFindings is called.
newFinding :: Text -> UTCTime -> UTCTime -> Finding

-- | This data type is used as a request parameter in the ListFindings
--   action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newFindingFilter</a> smart constructor.
data FindingFilter
FindingFilter' :: Maybe [Text] -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe TimestampRange -> Maybe [Severity] -> Maybe [Attribute] -> Maybe [Attribute] -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe [Text] -> FindingFilter

-- | Create a value of <a>FindingFilter</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:agentIds:FindingFilter'</a>, <a>findingFilter_agentIds</a> -
--   For a record to match a filter, one of the values that is specified
--   for this data type property must be the exact match of the value of
--   the <b>agentId</b> property of the Finding data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:rulesPackageArns:FindingFilter'</a>,
--   <a>findingFilter_rulesPackageArns</a> - For a record to match a
--   filter, one of the values that is specified for this data type
--   property must be the exact match of the value of the
--   <b>rulesPackageArn</b> property of the Finding data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTimeRange:FindingFilter'</a>,
--   <a>findingFilter_creationTimeRange</a> - The time range during which
--   the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:severities:FindingFilter'</a>, <a>findingFilter_severities</a>
--   - For a record to match a filter, one of the values that is specified
--   for this data type property must be the exact match of the value of
--   the <b>severity</b> property of the Finding data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:attributes:FindingFilter'</a>, <a>findingFilter_attributes</a>
--   - For a record to match a filter, the list of values that are
--   specified for this data type property must be contained in the list of
--   values of the <b>attributes</b> property of the Finding data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:userAttributes:FindingFilter'</a>,
--   <a>findingFilter_userAttributes</a> - For a record to match a filter,
--   the value that is specified for this data type property must be
--   contained in the list of values of the <b>userAttributes</b> property
--   of the Finding data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:autoScalingGroups:FindingFilter'</a>,
--   <a>findingFilter_autoScalingGroups</a> - For a record to match a
--   filter, one of the values that is specified for this data type
--   property must be the exact match of the value of the
--   <b>autoScalingGroup</b> property of the Finding data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:ruleNames:FindingFilter'</a>, <a>findingFilter_ruleNames</a> -
--   For a record to match a filter, one of the values that is specified
--   for this data type property must be the exact match of the value of
--   the <b>ruleName</b> property of the Finding data type.
newFindingFilter :: FindingFilter

-- | This data type is used in the Finding data type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newInspectorServiceAttributes</a> smart constructor.
data InspectorServiceAttributes
InspectorServiceAttributes' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Natural -> InspectorServiceAttributes

-- | Create a value of <a>InspectorServiceAttributes</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:rulesPackageArn:InspectorServiceAttributes'</a>,
--   <a>inspectorServiceAttributes_rulesPackageArn</a> - The ARN of the
--   rules package that is used to generate the finding.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentRunArn:InspectorServiceAttributes'</a>,
--   <a>inspectorServiceAttributes_assessmentRunArn</a> - The ARN of the
--   assessment run during which the finding is generated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:schemaVersion:InspectorServiceAttributes'</a>,
--   <a>inspectorServiceAttributes_schemaVersion</a> - The schema version
--   of this data type.
newInspectorServiceAttributes :: Natural -> InspectorServiceAttributes

-- | Contains information about the network interfaces interacting with an
--   EC2 instance. This data type is used as one of the elements of the
--   AssetAttributes data type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newNetworkInterface</a> smart constructor.
data NetworkInterface
NetworkInterface' :: Maybe [PrivateIp] -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe [SecurityGroup] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> NetworkInterface

-- | Create a value of <a>NetworkInterface</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:privateIpAddresses:NetworkInterface'</a>,
--   <a>networkInterface_privateIpAddresses</a> - A list of the private IP
--   addresses associated with the network interface. Includes the
--   privateDnsName and privateIpAddress.
--   
--   <a>$sel:ipv6Addresses:NetworkInterface'</a>,
--   <a>networkInterface_ipv6Addresses</a> - The IP addresses associated
--   with the network interface.
--   
--   <a>$sel:securityGroups:NetworkInterface'</a>,
--   <a>networkInterface_securityGroups</a> - A list of the security groups
--   associated with the network interface. Includes the groupId and
--   groupName.
--   
--   <a>$sel:publicDnsName:NetworkInterface'</a>,
--   <a>networkInterface_publicDnsName</a> - The name of a public DNS
--   associated with the network interface.
--   
--   <a>$sel:subnetId:NetworkInterface'</a>,
--   <a>networkInterface_subnetId</a> - The ID of a subnet associated with
--   the network interface.
--   
--   <a>$sel:networkInterfaceId:NetworkInterface'</a>,
--   <a>networkInterface_networkInterfaceId</a> - The ID of the network
--   interface.
--   
--   <a>$sel:privateDnsName:NetworkInterface'</a>,
--   <a>networkInterface_privateDnsName</a> - The name of a private DNS
--   associated with the network interface.
--   
--   <a>$sel:vpcId:NetworkInterface'</a>, <a>networkInterface_vpcId</a> -
--   The ID of a VPC associated with the network interface.
--   
--   <a>$sel:publicIp:NetworkInterface'</a>,
--   <a>networkInterface_publicIp</a> - The public IP address from which
--   the network interface is reachable.
--   
--   <a>$sel:privateIpAddress:NetworkInterface'</a>,
--   <a>networkInterface_privateIpAddress</a> - The private IP address
--   associated with the network interface.
newNetworkInterface :: NetworkInterface

-- | Contains information about a private IP address associated with a
--   network interface. This data type is used as a response element in the
--   DescribeFindings action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newPrivateIp</a> smart constructor.
data PrivateIp
PrivateIp' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> PrivateIp

-- | Create a value of <a>PrivateIp</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:privateDnsName:PrivateIp'</a>, <a>privateIp_privateDnsName</a>
--   - The DNS name of the private IP address.
--   
--   <a>$sel:privateIpAddress:PrivateIp'</a>,
--   <a>privateIp_privateIpAddress</a> - The full IP address of the network
--   inteface.
newPrivateIp :: PrivateIp

-- | Contains information about a resource group. The resource group
--   defines a set of tags that, when queried, identify the AWS resources
--   that make up the assessment target. This data type is used as the
--   response element in the DescribeResourceGroups action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newResourceGroup</a> smart constructor.
data ResourceGroup
ResourceGroup' :: Text -> NonEmpty ResourceGroupTag -> POSIX -> ResourceGroup

-- | Create a value of <a>ResourceGroup</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:ResourceGroup'</a>, <a>resourceGroup_arn</a> - The ARN of
--   the resource group.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:ResourceGroup'</a>, <a>resourceGroup_tags</a> - The tags
--   (key and value pairs) of the resource group. This data type property
--   is used in the CreateResourceGroup action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdAt:ResourceGroup'</a>, <a>resourceGroup_createdAt</a> -
--   The time at which resource group is created.
newResourceGroup :: Text -> NonEmpty ResourceGroupTag -> UTCTime -> ResourceGroup

-- | This data type is used as one of the elements of the ResourceGroup
--   data type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newResourceGroupTag</a> smart constructor.
data ResourceGroupTag
ResourceGroupTag' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> ResourceGroupTag

-- | Create a value of <a>ResourceGroupTag</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:ResourceGroupTag'</a>, <a>resourceGroupTag_value</a> -
--   The value assigned to a tag key.
--   
--   <a>$sel:key:ResourceGroupTag'</a>, <a>resourceGroupTag_key</a> - A tag
--   key.
newResourceGroupTag :: Text -> ResourceGroupTag

-- | Contains information about an Amazon Inspector rules package. This
--   data type is used as the response element in the DescribeRulesPackages
--   action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newRulesPackage</a> smart constructor.
data RulesPackage

--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--

--   the rules package.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:RulesPackage'</a>, <a>rulesPackage_name</a> - The name of
--   the rules package.
--   
--   <a>$sel:version:RulesPackage'</a>, <a>rulesPackage_version</a> - The
--   version ID of the rules package.
--   
--   <a>$sel:provider:RulesPackage'</a>, <a>rulesPackage_provider</a> - The
--   provider of the rules package.
newRulesPackage :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> RulesPackage

-- | This data type contains key-value pairs that identify various Amazon
--   resources.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newScope</a> smart constructor.
data Scope

-- | Create a value of <a>Scope</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:key:Scope'</a>, <a>scope_key</a> - The type of the scope.
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:Scope'</a>, <a>scope_value</a> - The resource identifier
--   for the specified scope type.
newScope :: Scope

-- | Contains information about a security group associated with a network
--   interface. This data type is used as one of the elements of the

--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSecurityGroup</a> smart constructor.

--   fields.

--   ID of the security group.
newSecurityGroup :: SecurityGroup

-- | This data type is used as a response element in the
--   ListEventSubscriptions action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSubscription</a> smart constructor.
data Subscription
Subscription' :: Text -> Text -> NonEmpty EventSubscription -> Subscription

-- | Create a value of <a>Subscription</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceArn:Subscription'</a>, <a>subscription_resourceArn</a>
--   - The ARN of the assessment template that is used during the event for
--   which the SNS notification is sent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:topicArn:Subscription'</a>, <a>subscription_topicArn</a> - The
--   ARN of the Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS) topic to which the
--   SNS notifications are sent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:eventSubscriptions:Subscription'</a>,
--   <a>subscription_eventSubscriptions</a> - The list of existing event
--   subscriptions.
newSubscription :: Text -> Text -> NonEmpty EventSubscription -> Subscription

-- | A key and value pair. This data type is used as a request parameter in
--   the SetTagsForResource action and a response element in the
--   ListTagsForResource action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newTag</a> smart constructor.
data Tag
Tag' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> Tag

-- | Create a value of <a>Tag</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:Tag'</a>, <a>tag_value</a> - A value assigned to a tag
--   key.
--   
--   <a>$sel:key:Tag'</a>, <a>tag_key</a> - A tag key.
newTag :: Text -> Tag

-- | The metadata about the Amazon Inspector application data metrics
--   collected by the agent. This data type is used as the response element
--   in the GetTelemetryMetadata action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newTelemetryMetadata</a> smart constructor.
data TelemetryMetadata
TelemetryMetadata' :: Maybe Integer -> Text -> Integer -> TelemetryMetadata

-- | Create a value of <a>TelemetryMetadata</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:dataSize:TelemetryMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>telemetryMetadata_dataSize</a> - The data size of messages that the
--   agent sends to the Amazon Inspector service.
--   
--   <a>$sel:messageType:TelemetryMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>telemetryMetadata_messageType</a> - A specific type of behavioral
--   data that is collected by the agent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:count:TelemetryMetadata'</a>, <a>telemetryMetadata_count</a> -
--   The count of messages that the agent sends to the Amazon Inspector
--   service.
newTelemetryMetadata :: Text -> Integer -> TelemetryMetadata

-- | This data type is used in the AssessmentRunFilter data type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newTimestampRange</a> smart constructor.
data TimestampRange
TimestampRange' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe POSIX -> TimestampRange

-- | Create a value of <a>TimestampRange</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:beginDate:TimestampRange'</a>, <a>timestampRange_beginDate</a>
--   - The minimum value of the timestamp range.
--   
--   <a>$sel:endDate:TimestampRange'</a>, <a>timestampRange_endDate</a> -
--   The maximum value of the timestamp range.
newTimestampRange :: TimestampRange
